Title: Abahanzi barimo King James na Knowless basendereje ibyishimo abanya-Kigali muri Tour du Rwanda (Amafoto)
Body:
Abahanzi bakomeye mu Rwanda barimo Butera Knowless, King James, Bruce Melodie, Bulldog n’abandi bashimishije abanya-Kigali mu gitaramo cya Tour du Rwanda.
Abahanzi bakomeye mu Rwanda barimo Butera Knowless, King James, Bruce Melodie, Bulldog n’abandi bashimishije abanya-Kigali mu gitaramo cya Tour du Rwanda.
Iki gitaramo cyabaye kuri uyu wa 29 Gashyantare 2020, gihuriramo abahanzi batandukanye bakomeye mu Rwanda barimo ababarizwa muri Kina Music nka Butera Knowless, Igor Mabano, Nel Ngabo, P, Bulldogg, Bruce Melodie, Davis D na King James.
Ni nyuma y’agace ka karindwi kasorejwe i Nyamirambo aho Umunya-Colombia Restrepo Jhonatan wa Androni Giocattoli - Sidermec yegukanye aka gace, yandika amateka mashya yo kuba umukinnyi wa kabiri wegukanye uduce tune twikurikiranya mu irushanwa rimwe.
Mu gitaramo cyakurikiyeho, ku rubyiniro habanjeho Rob Drabkin washimishije benshi mu ndirimbo ze zitandukanye biba akarusho ubwo yaririmbaga indirimbo izwi cyane mu Rwanda y’abana yitwa ‘Mbe Kanyamanza keza’.
Yakurikiwe n’umuraperi S-Wrap nawe washimishije benshi mu muziki wiganjemo uwo mu njyana ya Trap.
Nel Ngabo ubarizwa muri Kina Music niwe wakurikiye uyu muhanzi ashimisha benshi mu ndirimbo zirimo ‘Byakoroha’ asoreza kuri ‘Ya Motema’ yahuriyemo na P wahoze muri Dream Boyz.
Davis D ugezweho mu ndirimbo ‘Dede’ niwe wakurikiyeho yishimirwa mu ndirimbo zitandukanye. Uyu muhanzi yahereye ku yitwa ‘Biryogo’, ‘Soso’, ‘Sexy’, ‘Like you’ yahuriyemo na Seyn na Kevin Kade asoreza kuri ‘Dede’.
Nyuma, Igor Mabano yahise ajya ku rubyiniro yishimirwa mu bihangano bye bitandukanye birimo indirimbo yise ‘Ni ukuri’, ‘Go Back’, ‘Dear Mashuka’ yafashijwe ku rubyiniro na Rob Drabkin, ‘Gake’ asoreza kuri ‘Iyo Utegereza’.
Yahise aha umwanya Platini wahoze muri Dream Boyz usigaye yitwa P, uyu muhanzi aririmba indirimbo ze zirimo ‘Fata amano’ yakoranye na Safi Madiba ndetse na ‘Romeo & Juliet’ ya Dream Boyz yahozemo.
Bruce Melodie niwe wari utahiwe! Uyu muhanzi yishimiwe mu ndirimbo yinjiriyeho yitwa ‘Ndumiwe’, ‘Katerina’, ‘Kalibu nyumbani’ asoreza kuri ‘Kungola’ yahuriyemo na Sunnny yahagurukije n’iyonka muri iki gitaramo.
Aba bahanzi bakurikiwe na Bulldogg wahise yanzika n’indirimbo ze zirimo ‘Nk’umusaza’, ‘Cinema’ na ‘Zana’ na ‘Mpe Enkoni’. Uyu muhanzi ari mu bishimiwe bikomeye muri iki gitaramo.
Butera Knowless yaje akorera mu ngata uyu muhanzi mu ndirimbo yise ‘Yuda’, ‘Nkoraho’, ‘Sweet Mutima’, ‘Blessed’, ‘Day to day’.
Uyu muhanzikazi yishimiwe kuva atangiye kugeza asoje kuririmba. Abakunzi be bari bahimbawe ku buryo baririmbanaga nawe kuri buri ndirimbo yose yaririmbaga.
King James niwe washyize akadomo kuri iki gitaramo ahereye ku ndirimbo yise ‘Icyangombwa’ akajya anyuzamo akaganiriza abafana ababwira ati ‘muriteguye kubyina?’ bose bakiriza icyarimwe bamwereka ko banyotewe no gutaramana nawe.
Yakomereje kuri ‘Ayo arya ni ayanjye’, ‘Ibare’, ‘Buhoro buhoro’, ‘Umuriro watse’, ‘Ganyobwe’ asoreza kuri ‘Ndagutegereje’.
Uyu muhanzi ari muri bake babashije guhagurutsa buri wese wari uri muri iki gitaramo ndetse yeretswe urukundo mu buryo bukomeye.
Muri iki gitaramo habayemo n’umwanya wo gupima ku buntu virusi itera sida n’izindi ndwara, hakanatangwa inyigisho zitandukanye zifasha abaturage kubungabunga ubuzima bwabo.

Title: Filime zisaga 230 ziri guhatanira kwitabira iserukiramuco rya Mashariki African Film Festival
Body:
Iserukiramuco rya filimi nyafurika, Mashariki African Film Festival rigiye kuba ku nshuro ya gatandatu aho abakora filime bo mu bihugu bitandukanye byo muri Afurika no hanze yaho bazitabira.
Iserukiramuco rya filimi nyafurika, Mashariki African Film Festival rigiye kuba ku nshuro ya gatandatu aho abakora filime bo mu bihugu bitandukanye byo muri Afurika no hanze yaho bazitabira.
Iri serukiramuco ry’uyu mwaka rifite insanganyamatsiko igira iti “Kagire inkuru (tell the tale)”. Iyi nsanganyamatsiko yatekerejwe mu rwego rwo gushishikariza kubara inkuru zigisha kandi zubaka umuryango uzira umuze.
Mashariki African Film Festival ni iserukiramuco ngarukamwaka rigamije kumenyekanisha filime zikorerwa muri Afurika ndetse n’izo mu Rwanda no kuzikundisha abanyafurika n’isi yose muri rusange. Uyu mwaka iri serukiramuco rizaba guhera tariki 21 kugeza kuri 27 Werurwe 2020.
Kugeza ubu filime zigera mu 218 zamaze kwiyandikisha zisaba kuzitabira iri serukiramuco, nyuma ya tariki 25 Gashyantare 2020 nibwo hazamenyakana filime zabashije kwemererwa kuzitabira Mashariki African Film Festival.
Filime zizerekanwa muri iri serukiramuco ni izakozwe n’abanyafurika kandi zivuga inkuru zerekeranye na Afurika, zikaba zarakozwe nibura guhera muri 2018-2019. Uretse kwerekana filime, hazaba hari gahunda yo gutanga amasomo ajyanye na sinema, guhemba filime n’abakora filime mu byiciro bitandukanye.
Filime zizerekanwa ndetse nyuma yo kwerekanwa hazajya haba umwanya w’ibibazo n’ibisubizo mu gihe uwakoze iyo filime ahari.
‘Girls in Cinema’ ni kimwe mu bizaba bigize Mashariki African Film Festival muri uyu mwaka, iyi ikaba ari gahunda yo gushishikariza umubare munini w’abakobwa kwitabira kujya muri sinema. Hateganyijwe gahunda zo kwigisha abakobwa gukora filime bifashishije telefoni zigezweho (smartphones), nka kimwe mu bikoresha bihendutse ugereranyije n’ibindi bikoresho nkenerwa mu gukora filime.
Mashariki African Film Festival igamije guteza imbere sinema ya Afurika n’inkuru z’Abanyafurika ubwabo ari nazo zerekanwa cyane kurusha izo mu bindi bihugu. Izakorewe hanze ya Afurika zerekanwa muri iri serukiramuco ni izikubiyemo inkuru zivuga kuri Afurika gusa.

Title: Trezzo Mahoro akomeje kwandika izina muri filime iri mu zigezweho kuri Netflix
Body:
Nyuma ya Ncuti Gatwa wubatse izina muri filime yitwa ‘Sex Education’, yaciye ibintu kuri Netflix, undi munyarwanda witwa Trezzo Mahoro nawe ari mu bagezweho ku Isi yose muri filime iri guca kuri uru rubuga.
Nyuma ya Ncuti Gatwa wubatse izina muri filime yitwa ‘Sex Education’, yaciye ibintu kuri Netflix, undi munyarwanda witwa Trezzo Mahoro nawe ari mu bagezweho ku Isi yose muri filime iri guca kuri uru rubuga.
Trezzo Mahoro yavukiye mu Rwanda gusa aba muri Vancouver, muri Canada. Yatangiye kwiyumvamo ibyo gukina filime ari mu mwaka wa nyuma w’amashuri yisumbuye.
Yamamaye muri filime zitandukanye zirimo "The Magicians" yakinnyemo yitwa Ralphie, “The X-Files” yakinnyemo yitwa Crewman ya Fox, "iZombie" yakinnyemo yitwa Darius, ubu agezweho muri filime Nyamerika yitwa ‘To All the Boys: P.S. I Still Love You’ ica kuri Netflix akinamo yitwa Lucas.
Iyi filime ni igice gishya kuko yabanjirijwe n’ikindi cyitwaga ‘To All the Boys I’ve Loved Before’ yagiye hanze muri 2018.
Yanditse ikomowe ku gitabo cy’umwanditsi w’Umunyamerika witwa Jenny Han, yayobowe na Michael Fimognari yandikwa na Sofia Alvarez na J. Mills Goodloe.
Ivuga ku nkuru y’umukobwa wagiye akunda abahungu bagiye bahura mu bihe bitandukanye, akajya abandikira amabaruwa noneho rimwe murumuna we aza kuyafata ayoherereza ba bahungu batanu baba barakundanye na we.
Umwe muri bo akaza kumubwira ngo bakundane ariko ari ukubeshya bagira ngo batere ishyari umukobwa baba basanzwe bakundana uba wamwanze, agace ka mbere karangira aba bombi baratangiye gukundana bya nyabyo.
Mu gace ka kabiri barakomeza bagakundana ariko hakaza undi muhungu bari baroherereje ibaruwa akanamusubiza nyuma bakaza guhurira ahantu bakagerageza gukundana ariko umukobwa akaza gusanga bitakunda.
Trezzo Mahoro[Lucas] aba ari umwe mu nshuti z’uyu mukobwa ubusanzwe witwa Lana Condor uba akinamo yitwa Lara Jean, aba ari mu bo yigeze gukunda ndetse akanamwandikira ariko Lucas akamwanga kuko aba ari umutinganyi.
Trezzo Mahoro afite imyaka 23. Icyo ahuriyeho na Ncuti Gatwa nawe uherutse kwamamara cyane muri Sex Education ndetse ukurikirwa n’abasaga miliyoni ebyiri kuri Instagram, n’uko muri izi filime zatumye bamenyekana cyane bose bazikinamo ari abakundana bahuje ibitsina [abatinganyi].
Reba agace gato ka ‘To All the Boys: P.S. I Still Love You’, filime iri ku bica bigacika kuri Netflix yakinnyemo umunyarwanda

Title: Buravan, Michaël Sengazi na Hervé Kimenyi bazifashishwa mu kwezi ko kwizihiza imyaka 50 OIF imaze
Body:
Buri mwaka tariki 20 Werurwe, Umuryango Mpuzamahanga w’Ibihugu bikoresha Igifaransa (OIF) uyobowe na Louise Mushikiwabo, ibihugu biwugize byizihiza umunsi mpuzamahanga wawuhariwe.
Buri mwaka tariki 20 Werurwe, Umuryango Mpuzamahanga w’Ibihugu bikoresha Igifaransa (OIF) uyobowe na Louise Mushikiwabo, ibihugu biwugize byizihiza umunsi mpuzamahanga wawuhariwe.
Ni igikorwa cyatangiye mu 1988, nk’uburyo abari muri uyu Muryango wa OIF uhurije hamwe abaturage bavuga Igifaransa basaga miliyoni 300 ku Isi, bakwishimira ururimi rw’Igifaransa rukoreshwa na byinshi muri byo.
Kuri iyi nshuro muri uyu mwaka wa 2020, birihariye cyane cyane kuri Ambasade y’u Bufaransa mu Rwanda. Ku rwego mpuzamahanga ho hazaba hizihizwa imyaka 50 uyu muryango wa OIF umaze utangijwe.
Iki gikorwa kizabera mu Rwanda ku bufatanye n’Ibigo bya Leta bitandukanye birimo Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga ndetse n’iy’uburezi, abadipolomate bahagarariye ibihugu bigize uyu muryango n’abandi bayobora OIF.
Muri Werurwe hateganyijwe ibikorwa bitandukanye mu Mujyi wa Kigali by’umwihariko hazabanza icyo gutangiza ku mugaragaro uku kwezi nk’uko kwizihiza isabukuru y’imyaka 50 uyu muryango umaze.
Chargé d’Affaires muri Ambasade y’u Bufaransa i Kigali, Jérémie Blin na Juliette Bigo uyobora Ikigo Ndangamuco cy’Abafaransa mu Rwanda bazagirana ikiganiro n’itangazamakuru ku wa 04 Werurwe 2020 saa tanu za mu gitondo kuri Onomo Hotel.
Ibindi bikorwa biteganyijwe harimo igitaramo cy’umuhanzi Yvan Buravan wegukanye Prix découverte RFI mu 2018 kizabera muri Serena Hotel ku wa 20 Werurwe 2020, guhera saa mbili z’umugoroba aho kwinjira bizaba ari ubuntu.
Ikigo Ndangamuco cy’Abafaransa mu Rwanda cyateguwe n’igikorwa cy’amarushanwa kizahuza abanyempano mu kuvuga imivugo by’umwihariko yo mu rurimi rw’Igifaransa. Kizabera ku nzu y’imyidagaduro ya Kimisagara ku wa 14 Werurwe 2020 hagamijwe kuzamura impano nshya. Uzaba uwa mbere umuvugo we uzatunganywa werekanwe mu gitaramo cya Buravan.
Hateganyijwe amarushanwa ya bandes dessinées [inkuru zishushanyije] yateguwe ku bufatanye na éditions Bakamé, abahize abandi bazatangazwa ku wa 21 Werurwe 2020 ibikorwa byabo bigaragazwe mu gihe cy’icyumweru mu isomero rusange ry’Umujyi wa Kigali mu gihe cy’icyumweru.
Uku kwezi kuzasozwa na Wallonie-Bruxelles, Michaël Sengazi watwaye Prix RFI Talents du rire 2019 na Hervé Kimenyi bazataramira abazitabira umugoroba wiswe Francofourires , mu gitaramo cy’urwenya kizabera muri Kigali Cultural Village ku wa 28 Werurwe.
Uyu muryango washingiwe i Niamey muri Niger tariki 20 Werurwe 1970, utangizwa n’ibihugu 21 byiganjemo ibyahoze bikolonijwe n’u Bufaransa.
Kuri ubu ugizwe n’ibihugu 84 birimo ibinyamuryango byuzuye 54, ibihugu bine byiyunze n’ibihugu 26 by’indorerezi.
Louise Mushikiwabo niwe muyobozi wawo, yatangiye kuwuyobora muri Mutarama 2019.

Title: Paris: Abantu 30 bafashwe bashinjwa guteza imvururu hafi y’aho Fally Ipupa yakoreye igitaramo
Body:
Ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 28 Gashyantare 2020 Fally Ipupa yakoreye igitaramo gikomeye mu Mujyi wa Paris mu Bufaransa, abagera kuri 30 batawe muri yombi kubera guteza imvururu hafi y’aho iki gitaramo cyari kubera bagambiriye kubuza abantu kukitabira.
Ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 28 Gashyantare 2020 Fally Ipupa yakoreye igitaramo gikomeye mu Mujyi wa Paris mu Bufaransa, abagera kuri 30 batawe muri yombi kubera guteza imvururu hafi y’aho iki gitaramo cyari kubera bagambiriye kubuza abantu kukitabira.
Mbere y’iki gitaramo, ahagana saa kumi n’ebyiri z’umugoroba hafi y’aho bategera ’Gare de Lyon’, i Paris, hagaragaye inkongi yatewe n’abigaragambya bagamije kubuza abantu kwitabira igitaramo cya Fally Ipupa, cyaberaga hafi aho.
Aba biganjemo abarwanya ubuyobozi bwa Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, batwitse ibishyirwamo imyanda ndetse n’utumoto duto twari aho.
Icyakora bakomwe mu nkokora na Polisi y’u Bufaransa n’abazimya umuriro bahise bawucyaha.
Umunyamakuru wa BBC wari uri aho byabereye yagize ati” Hari umwotsi mwinshi cyane, abantu biruka batwika ibintu. Byagaragaraga ko barakaye. Urujya n’uruza rwari rwakumiriwe mu byerekezo byose. Byari akaga”.
“Abigaragambya bajugunyaga buri kimwe bashoboye kuri polisi ndetse n’abazimya inkongi bageragezaga gukora akazi kabo. Batwikaga buri kimwe bashoboye kandi bakakirwanisha.”
Igitaramo cya Fally Ipupa cyabereye ahitwa Accor Hotels Arena.
Polisi yabashije gukumira ko aba bigaragambyaga irabatatanya ndetse ntibabangamira igitaramo cya Fally Ipupa, kuko byarangiye kibaye cyitabirwa n’abarenga 20 000.
Abigaragambyaga bari bagamije gukumira abantu kwitabira igitaramo cya Fally Ipupa ushinjwa kuba inshuti ya hafi ya Perezida Felix Tshisekedi umaze umwaka ayobora Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo.
Polisi yavuze ko yataye muri yombi abantu 30 mu gihe abarenga 54 bo baciwe amande bashinjwa kugira uruhare muri iyi myigaragambyo.
Nyuma y’igitaramo cyagenze neza, Fally Ipupa abinyujije ku mbuga nkoranyambaga yashimiye buri umwe wakitabiriye ndetse anihanganisha abatabashije kwinjira kubera ko amatike yari yarashize cyera.
Yagize ati” Ndashimira abantu 20000 bitabiriye igitaramo cyanjye kitazibagirana cyo ku wa 28 Gashyantare 2020, urukundo rwanyu rwatumye twongera kwandika amateka mashya. Ndihanganisha abatabashije kwinjira imbere, tuzasubira. Ndabakunda cyane.”

Title: U Budage: Filime ‘Notre-Dame du Nil’ yegukanye igihembo mu iserukiramuco rikomeye “Berlinale 2020”
Body:
Ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 28 Gashyantare 2020 Filime ‘Notre-Dame du Nil’ yegukanye igihembo cya Filime nziza “Best Film” mu iserukiramuco rikomeye ryitwa “Berlinale 2020” [ Berlin International Film Festival] ryabaga ku nshuro ya 70.
Ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 28 Gashyantare 2020 Filime ‘Notre-Dame du Nil’ yegukanye igihembo cya Filime nziza “Best Film” mu iserukiramuco rikomeye ryitwa “Berlinale 2020” [ Berlin International Film Festival] ryabaga ku nshuro ya 70.
Berlinale [Berlin International Film Festival] ni iserukiramuco mpuzamahanga rya Filime rikomeye mu gihugu cy’u Budage no ku mugabane w’u Burayi yabaga ku nshuro ya 70.
Berlinale muri uyu mwaka yatangiye tariki Tariki 20 Gashyantare izageza ku itariki ya 1 Werurwe 2020. Aha Filime ‘Notre-Dame du Nil’ yakomotse ku gitabo cya Mukasonga Scholastique ikaba yegukanye igihembo cya filimi nziza “Best Film “.
Iyi filime yashibutse ku gitabo cyanditswe na Mukasonga, Umunyarwandakazi uba mu Bufaransa cyasohotse mu 2012, kigahabwa ibihembo mpuzamahanga bibiri ari byo Prix Renaudot na Prix Ahmadou Kourouma.
Muri iki gitabo Mukasonga agaragaza itotezwa ryakorerwaga abakobwa b’abanyeshuri bakomokaga mu bwoko bw’Abatutsi mbere ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Umwanditsi avuga ibyabereye mu Kigo cy’amashuri yisumbuye cyitwaga Notre Dame du Nil cyari icy’abakobwa gusa.
Nyuma y’imyaka umunani iki gitabo gisohotse, ikigo gikora filime cyitwa Les Films du Tambour kiyobowe na Marie Legrand na Rani Massalha, bari kumwe n’umuhanga mu gutunganya filime Atiq Rahimi, baje mu Rwanda gukora filime ishingiye kuri iki gitabo.
Iyi filime yakiniwe mu Karere ka Musanze no muri Rutsiro ku Ishuri rya Murunda, igaragarano abakobwa b’Abanyarwandakazi bagera kuri 20 barimo Amanda Mugabekazi, Malaika Uwamahoro, Albina Sydney Kirenga, Rubango Belinda na Clariella Bizimana.

Title: Adrien Misigaro na Gentil Misigaro bageze mu Rwanda aho bagiye gukorera ibitaramo bikomeye (Video)
Body:
Abahanzi bamaze kubaka izina mu buryo bukomeye mu muziki wo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana, Adrien Misigaro na Gentil Misigaro baje mu Rwanda aho bitabiriye ibitaramo bazahuriramo na Israel Mbonyi.
Abahanzi bamaze kubaka izina mu buryo bukomeye mu muziki wo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana, Adrien Misigaro na Gentil Misigaro baje mu Rwanda aho bitabiriye ibitaramo bazahuriramo na Israel Mbonyi.
Aba bahanzi bageze ku kibuga cy’indege cya Kanombe ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 28 Gashyantare bari kumwe n’irindi tsinda ry’abaririmbyi bazafatanya nabo.
Adrien Misigaro yabwiye itangazamakuru ko yababajwe cyane no gufungwa kwa Fireman nubwo ntacyo yari kubikoraho kuko gahunda zagombaga gukomeza mu gihe umuntu yaguye mu makosa.
Ati “Nk’umukozi w’Imana ndamusengera nta kindi kintu nabivugaho, gahunda za leta zigomba gukomeza kuko umuntu iyo ari mu makosa aba agomba gufungwa yaba arengana akarenganurwa. Hari gahunda tuzakorana, hari n’indirimbo ze twakoze.”
Gentil Misigaro we yavuze ko yari akumbuye mu Rwanda ndetse anagaragaza ko ari ahantu ahoza ku mutima cyane ko yanaje yambaye imyambaro yahakorewe.
Mu mwaka wa 2019 nibwo Adrien Misigaro yagiye gusura urubyiruko ruri kugororerwa i Iwawa, iki gihe uyu muhanzi yavuyeyo atangije Ubukangurambaga yise “Melody of New Hope” bugamije gukangurira urubyiruko rutandukanye kwirinda no kwitandukanya n’ibiyobyabwenge.
Asubiye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, aho asanzwe atuye, uyu muhanzi uri mu bagezweho muri Diaspora mu bakora indirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana yasobanuriye ubuyobozi bw’itorero asengeramo ibyo avuyemo mu Rwanda.
Nyuma yo kwishimira iki gikorwa yatangije, ubuyobozi bw’Itorero asanzwe asengeramo muri Amerika bwiyemeje kumutera ingabo mu bitugu bukamushyigikira ndetse kugeza ubu uhereye ku muyobozi w’iri torero n’abandi bakozi b’Imana bafatanya umurimo bazamuherekeza mu bitaramo ateganya gukorera mu Rwanda muri Werurwe 2020.
Ibi bitaramo byiswe “Each one reach one” byateguwe mu rwego rwo gukangurira buri wese mu banyarwanda kuba bafasha byibuza umuntu umwe wabaswe n’ibiyobyabwenge kubivamo bityo bigafasha kwihutisha ubukangurambaga bwa “Melody of New Hope”.
Mu gihe azamara mu Rwanda, Adrien Misigaro n’ikipe bazaba bari kumwe bazasura ibigo bitandukanye bifasha ababaswe n’ibiyobyabwenge.
Igitaramo cy’i Kigali kizaba tariki 8 Werurwe 2020 muri Intare Arena mu gihe tariki 15 Werurwe 2020 bazakomereza muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda, Ishami rya Huye muri Auditorium.

Title: Joeboy yashimishije abitabiriye igitaramo cya Kigali Jazz Junction (Amafoto)
Body:
Amaso y’abakunzi b’umuziki by’umwihariko wa Jazz ahora ashyugumbwa kureba igitaramo ngarukakwezi cya Kigali Jazz Junction kimaze kubaka izina kandi kikaba kiri mu byitabirwa cyane.
Amaso y’abakunzi b’umuziki by’umwihariko wa Jazz ahora ashyugumbwa kureba igitaramo ngarukakwezi cya Kigali Jazz Junction kimaze kubaka izina kandi kikaba kiri mu byitabirwa cyane.
Kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 28 Gashyantare 2020, nabwo abakunzi b’umuziki bari babukereye bambariye kureba abahanzi bakomeye barimo Davis D ugezweho mu ndirimbo yitwa ‘Dede’ na Niyo Bosco uri mu bahanzi bari kuzamuka neza mu ndirimbo zitanga ubutumwa ku buzima bwa buri munsi.
Umunya-Nigeria Joseph Akinfenwa Donus umaze kwamamara nka Joeboy nawe yari ari mu bafitiwe amatsiko cyane ko afite ibihangano bigezweho mu Rwanda no muri Afurika muri rusange.
Abakobwa b’ibizengerezi bakibyiruka bari biganje muri iki gitaramo bakamejeje, isegonda ku rindi babyinana imbaduko idasanzwe ndetse byarimba bagasanga abahanzi ku rubyiniro bakabafasha kubyina indirimbo zabo.
Niyo Bosco niwe wabimburiye abandi aririmba indirimbo zitandukanye z’abandi bahanzi ndetse anasusurutsa abantu mu zindi ze zirimo ‘Ibanga’ na ‘Ubigenza Ute’ zazamuye amarangamutima ya buri wese wamurebaga.
Uyu muhanzi ubusanzwe witwa Niyokwizerwa Bosco, afite ubumuga bwo kutabona ariko atangaza benshi kubera uburyo akirigita imirya ya guitar.
Davis D nawe yaje amukorera mu ngata mu ndirimbo ze nka ‘Dede’, ‘Biryogo’, ‘Sexy’, ‘Soso’ n’izindi zitandukanye. Ubusanzwe yitwa Icyishaka David ni umwe mu bahanzi baririmba Afrobeat bafite uburyo butandukanye n’abandi baririmbamo bigashimisha benshi.
Uyu musore yageze kuri ‘Dede’ ikunzwe mu bice byose by’igihugu abantu bose n’uwari wicaye bahagurukira icyari mwe bacinya akadiho karahava cyane ko iyi iri mu ndirimbo zikunzwe cyane.
Yaririmbye mu buryo bwa Semi Live ariko kuva ku ndirimbo ye ya mbere kugeza ku yo yasorejeho abantu hafi ya bose wabonaga akanyamuneza ari kose bishimiye ibihangano bye kandi bacinya akadiho nta nkomyi.
Joeboy niwe wari utegerejwe! Abantu babwiwe ko agiye gusesekara ku rubyiniro bose nk’abitsamuye basakuriza icyarimwe berekana ko bamwishimiye ku nshuro ye ya mbere aje mu Rwanda.
Yaririmbye indirimbo ze zitandukanye guhera ku ya mbere kugeza ku ya nyuma abantu ubona akanyamuneza ari kose bafatanya nawe kuririmba. Yaririmbye mu buryo bwa Playback.
Uyu musore w’imyaka 22, yavutse ku wa 21 Gicurasi 1997 mu Mujyi wa Lagos muri Nigeria, akaba ari umwanditsi n’umuririmbyi. Abarizwa mu nzu ifasha abahanzi ya emPawa Africa.
Yize muri Kaminuza ya Lagos izwi nka UNILAG aho yakuye impamyabumenyi mu bijyanye n’imicungire y’abakozi.
Joeboy yatangiye kuririmba ubwo yari afite imyaka 16. Ku myaka 17 akora indirimbo ye ya mbere yise ‘Gbeseyin’. Yasubiyemo ‘Shape of You’ ya Ed Sheeran yakirwa neza ndetse inatumbagiza izina rye ku rwego ruhambaye.
Uyu muhanzi akimara kuririmba iyi ndirimbo ya Sheeran yahise yemererwa na Mr Eazi ubufasha ndetse anamusinyisha mu nzu ye ifasha abahanzi ya Eazi’s "Banku" Music.
Mu ndirimbo yakoze zamenyekanye harimo ‘Baby’, ‘Beginning’, ‘All of You’ n’izindi nyinshi zatumye muri iki gihe abarirwa mu bahanzi bahagaze neza muri Nigeria. Amaze gukora album imwe yise ‘Love & Light’. Joeboy aherutse gusohoka ku rutonde rwa BBC rw’abahanzi bo kwitega mu 2020.
Joeboy yaje mu Rwanda abisikana n’Umuraperi Jidenna Theodore Mobisson [Jidenna] nawe wo muri Nigeria waherukaga gutaramira mu Rwanda tariki 29 Ugushyingo 2019 mu gitaramo cyitabiriwe mu buryo bukomeye cyabereye muri Kigali Conference and Exhibition Village hazwi nka Camp Kigali.

Title: Miss World yahaye ikaze Miss Nishimwe Naomie uzitabira iri rushanwa uyu mwaka
Body:
Ku wa 22 Gashyantare 2020 Nishimwe Naomie yatsindiye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda, uyu mukobwa wahise anabona itike yo kwitabira irushanwa rya Miss World 2020 yamaze guhabwa ikaze n’abaritegura.
Ku wa 22 Gashyantare 2020 Nishimwe Naomie yatsindiye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda, uyu mukobwa wahise anabona itike yo kwitabira irushanwa rya Miss World 2020 yamaze guhabwa ikaze n’abaritegura.
Babinyujije ku rukuta rwabo rwa Twitter, Ubuyobozi bwa Miss World bwagize buti” Mudufashe duhe ikaze Nishimwe Naomie mu muryango wa Miss World.”
Miss Nishimwe watsindiye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020 yahise ahabwa itike yo guhagararira u Rwanda mu irushanwa rya Miss World rizaba riba ku nshuro ya 70.
Uyu mukobwa afite umushinga wo kurwanya Kwiheba mu rubyiruko, cyane ko yasanze ari ikibazo gikomeye kandi akenshi abantu badaha agaciro.
Miss Nishimwe muri Miss World azaba abaye umunyarwandakazi wa gatanu witabiriye iri rushanwa u Rwanda ruzaba rwujuje imyaka itanu rwitabira.
Mutesi Jolly niwe mukobwa wa mbere witabiriye Miss World mu 2016, kuva icyo gihe u Rwanda ntirugisiba mu irushanwa.
Nimwiza Meghan niwe Munyarwandakazi uherutse muri iri rushanwa ryabereye mu mujyi wa Londres mu Bwongereza mu mpera za 2019.
Nta mukobwa n’umwe wari wahagararira u Rwanda ngo acyure ikamba iryo ariryo ryose nubwo bagerageza kwitwara neza.

Title: Musanze: The Ben yasusurukije abitabiriye Tour du Rwanda mu gitaramo gikomeye (Video)

Abanyamusanze bitabiriye iki gitaramo banyuzwe n’uburyohe bw’umuziki w’uyu muhanzi, usanzwe ukundwa cyane n’abiganjemo abakobwa kubera ibihangano bibashima ku ndiba z’imitima.
Yaririmbye ibihangano bye bitandukanye byakunzwe, ageze ku yitwa ‘Imfubyi’ afatanya na Bulldogg bayikoranye, nabyo binyura benshi mu buryo bukomeye.
Yaririmbye izindi zirimo ‘Soma Skol’, ‘Zoubeda’ yakoranye na Kamichi, ‘Thank You’ yakoranye na Tom Close, ‘Habibi’ n’izindi zitandukanye.
The Ben ari kwifashishwa na Skol mu bitaramo bitandukanye, icya mbere yagikoreye Kimironko ku wa 23 Gashyantare, i Musanze ku wa 27 Gashyantare ndetse ategerejwe mu kindi kizabera i Kigali ku wa 29 Gashyantare 2020.

Title: Uwase wahagarariye u Rwanda muri Miss Supranational 2018 yitabiriye irindi rushanwa rikomeye
Body:
Uwase Clémentine [Tina] watorewe guhagararira u Rwanda muri Miss Supranational 2018 asimbuye Munyaneza Djazira, yitabiriye irindi rushanwa rya Miss Elite 2020 mu cyiciro cya nyuma.
Uwase Clémentine [Tina] watorewe guhagararira u Rwanda muri Miss Supranational 2018 asimbuye Munyaneza Djazira, yitabiriye irindi rushanwa rya Miss Elite 2020 mu cyiciro cya nyuma.
Uyu mukobwa ahatanye na bagenzi 16 baturutse mu bindi bihugu bitandukanye bitabira iri rushanwa riri kubera muri Pologne ari naho Uwase yiga muri kaminuza ya Wyższa Szkoła Bankowa yigisha ibyerekeye ubukungu.
Uwase yabwiye IGIHE ko umukobwa uzahiga abandi azahabwa amajwi hakurikijwe uko yitwaye imbere y’akanama nkemurampaka, intambuko, ubwiza n’ukuntu ashyigikiwe ku mbuga nkoranyambaga z’irushanwa.
Azahembwa amafaranga ataratangajwe umubare ndetse afotorwe bya kinyamwuga mu gihe cy’icyumweru ari mu butembere ku mucanga wa Miami muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Aba bakobwa bageze mu cyiciro cya nyuma bari 20, batatu barasezererwa kubera kutubahiriza igihe n’imyitozo.
Uwase yavuze ko yiha amahirwe n’ubwo abona bitoroshye. Yagize ati “Birakomeye ariko amahirwe ndayiha, n’ubwo ntakubwira umubare njanishije kuko irushanwa aba ari irushanwa.”
Umunsi ny’irizina wo gutora Miss Elite 2020, ni kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 29 Gashyantare 2020. Hazatorwa Miss Elite n’ibisonga bye bibiri.
Uwase ubusanzwe ni umunyamideli ndetse yegukanye ibihembo bitandukanye birimo icya Top Model Africa cyabereye muri Zimbabwe mu 2016 anitabira World Next Top Model 2017 ryabereye mu Mujyi wa Beirut muri Liban, aza mu bakobwa bageze mu cyiciro cya nyuma.
Yitabiriye amarushanwa y’ubwiza nka Miss Supranational 2018 naho ntiyahirwa kuko atigeze aza mu myanya y’imbere.

Title: Senderi yahawe igihembo n’akarere ka Kirehe
Body:
Umuhanzi Nzaramba Eric benshi bamaze kumenya nka Senderi International Hit yahawe igihembo n’akarere akomokamo ka Kirehe mu Ntara y’Iburasirazuba kubera gukora ibihangano bishimisha abaturage b’aho akomoka n’utundi turere muri gahunda z’iterambere ryigihugu.
Umuhanzi Nzaramba Eric benshi bamaze kumenya nka Senderi International Hit yahawe igihembo n’akarere akomokamo ka Kirehe mu Ntara y’Iburasirazuba kubera gukora ibihangano bishimisha abaturage b’aho akomoka n’utundi turere muri gahunda z’iterambere ryigihugu.
Yabwiye IGIHE ko yahawe iki gihembo kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 27 Gashyantare 2020 muri aka karere akomokamo.
Ati “Naraye mpawe igihembo cy’indashyikirwa n’akarere ka Kirehe nk’umuhanzi uhavuka ugerageza gushimisha abaturage baho n’utundi turere muri gahunda z’iterambere ry’igihugu, mu kurinda ibyagezweho no kubyongera biciye mu bihangano by’uburere mboneragihugu.”
Yavuze ko indirimbo zatumye ahabwa iki gihembo zirimo iyitwa ‘Ibidakwiriye nzabivuga’, ‘Nta mpamvu n’imwe’, ‘Iyo twicaranye’, ‘Abanyarwanda twaribohoye’, ‘Tuzarinda igihugu’ na ‘Twambariye gutsinda’.
Uyu muhanzi yahawe iki gihembo ku munsi wo gusoza ibyitwa ‘Open Day’ bikorwa n’abatuye muri aka karere, uyu akaba ari munsi abantu n’ibigo byigenga bakorera mu karere bose bahurira mu imurikabikorwa bakerekana ibyo bamaze kugeza ku baturage hanarebwa gahunda z’ibihe biri imbere.
Senderi aherutse gushyira hanze indirimbo zirimo iyo yise ‘Imitako ya Migongo’ na ‘Ikirashi’ yakoranye na Intore Tuyisenge .
Uyu muhanzi yatangiye kuririmba mbere gato ya 1994. Umuziki we wiganjemo indirimbo zivuga kuri politiki y’iterambere ry’igihugu, isuku, kwirinda ibyorezo nka Sida na Malariya, ubukungu, urukundo, umutekano n’ibindi.
Senderi kandi akunda no kwibanda ku ndirimbo zihumuriza abarokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 n’izamagana abahembera amacakubiri.
Reba indirimbo Senderi aheruka gushyira hanze yise ‘Ikirashi’

Title: Musanze: Bizihiwe n’umuziki w’abahanzi bakomeye mu gitaramo cya Tour du Rwanda (Amafoto)
Body:
Byari ku nshuro ya kabiri muri uyu mwaka habaye igitaramo cya Tour du Rwanda iri kugana ku musozo, aho abahanzi batandukanye bakomeye bataramiye abanya-Musanze bigatinda.
Byari ku nshuro ya kabiri muri uyu mwaka habaye igitaramo cya Tour du Rwanda iri kugana ku musozo, aho abahanzi batandukanye bakomeye bataramiye abanya-Musanze bigatinda.
Ni mu gitaramo cyabaye nyuma y’agace k’iri rushanwa rimaze kuba ubukombe mu magare ribera mu Rwanda, kabaye kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 27 Gashyantare 2020 aho Umunya-Colombia Restrepo Jhonatan yegukanye aka gace ka Gatanu ka Tour du Rwanda 2020 ka Rubavu-Musanze, akoresheje 2h 08’19”.
Mujyi wa Musanze hari hashyushye bose biteguye kwirebera aba banyonzi, banabukereye kwirebera abahanzi batandukanye bakomeye bagombaga kubataramira kakahava muri stade Ubworoherane yo muri aka karere.
Guhera saa kumi,abantu banyuranagamo basiganwa buri wese ashaka umwanya w’imbere ngo aze kwirebera umuhanzi yihebeye nta nkomyi.
Iki gitaramo cyabaye nyuma y’ikindi cyabereye mu karere ka Rubavu mu Ntara y’Uburengerazuba kuri Kivu Beach iruhande rwa Serena Hotel kuwa Gatatu tariki 27 Gashyantare 2020. Cyari cyitabiriwe n’umubare munini w’abakunzi b’umuziki biganjemo cyane urubyiruko.
Abatandukanye bakomeye mu Rwanda biganjemo ababarizwa mu nzu ifasha abahanzi ya Kina Music hamwe na King James, Bulldogg, Davis D na Bruce Melodie ndetse na Rob Drabkin na S-Wrap bari baturutse muri Amerika nibo basusurukije abari bitabiriye.
Saa kumi n’ebyiri zishyira saa moya ku rubyiniro habanjeho Rob Drabkin washimishije benshi mu ndirimbo ze zitandukanye biba akarusho ubwo yaririmbaga indirimbo izwi cyane mu Rwanda y’abana yitwa ‘Mbe Kanyamanza keza’.
Yakurikiwe n’umuraperi S-Wrap nawe washimishije benshi mu muziki wiganjemo uwo mu njyana ya Trap.
Davis D ugezweho mu ndirimbo ‘Dede’ niwe wakurikiyeho yishimirwa mu ndirimbo zitandukanye. Uyu muhanzi yahereye ku yitwa ‘Biryogo’, ‘Soso’, ‘Sexy’ asoreza kuri ‘Dede’.
Nel Ngabo ubarizwa muri Kina Music niwe wakurikiye uyu muhanzi ashimisha benshi mu ndirimbo zirimo ‘Why’ iri mu zo yahereyeho, ‘Nzahinduka’, ‘Byakoroha asoreza kuri ‘Ya Motema’ yahuriyemo na P wahoze muri Dream Boyz.
Bakiri ku rubyiniro P yahise asangwayo na Polisi y’u Rwanda, bakora ubukangurambaga iherutse gutangiza n’abafatanyabikorwa bayo bw’ibyumweru 52 bugamije kurwanya no gukumira impanuka buzwi nka “Gerayo Amahoro”.
Nyuma, Igor Mabano yahise ajya ku rubyiniro yishimirwa mu bihangano bye bitandukanye birimo indirimbo yise ‘Urakunzwe’ yahereyeho, ‘Back’, ‘Dear Mashuka’ yafashijwe ku rubyiniro na Rob Drabkin, ‘Iyo Utegereza’ asoreza kuri ‘Gake’ yahuriyemo na Nel Ngabo banaririmbanye muri iki gitaramo.
Aba bahanzi bakurikiwe na Bulldogg wahise yanzika n’indirimbo ze zirimo ‘Nk’umusaza’, ‘Cinema’ na ‘Zana’ yahuriyemo na Deejay Lenzo banajyanye ku rubyiniro muri iki gitaramo.
Bruce Melodie niwe wari utahiwe! Uyu muhanzi yishimiwe mu ndirimbo yinjiriyeho yitwa ‘Ndumiwe’, ‘Ikinya’, ‘Fresh’ asoreza kuri ‘Kungola’ yahuriyemo na Sunnny yahagurukije n’iyonka muri iki gitaramo.
Butera Knowless yaje akorera mu ngata uyu muhanzi mu ndirimbo yise ‘Baramushaka’, ‘Nkoraho’, ‘Sweet Mutima’, ‘Urugero’, ‘Blessed’, ‘Ko nashize’ asoreza ku yo yise ‘Ujya unkumbura’.
King James niwe washyize akadomo kuri iki gitaramo gusa atenguhwa n’umuriro kuko yatangiye kuririmba ahereye ku ndirimbo yise ‘Rasta’ yajya kuririmba izindi zirimo ‘Ganyobwe’ umuriro ukagenda ucika..
Muri iki gitaramo habayemo n’umwanya wo gupima ku buntu virusi itera sida n’izindi ndwara, hakanatangwa inyigisho zitandukanye zifasha abaturage kubungabunga ubuzima bwabo.
Biteganyijwe igitaramo nk’iki kizabera mu Mujyi wa Kigali kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki ya 29 Gashyantare 2020 muri Car Free Zone ku bufatanye n’Umujyi wa Kigali muri gahunda y’ibitaramo bisoza ukwezi usanzwe ukora.

Title: Umunyarwenya Kenny BlaQ witabiriye Seka Live yageze i Kigali
Body:
Ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa 27 Gashyantare 2020, umunyarwenya wo muri Nigeria Kenny BlaQ yageze i Kigali aho yitabiriye igitaramo cya Seka Live isoza uku kwezi.
Ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa 27 Gashyantare 2020, umunyarwenya wo muri Nigeria Kenny BlaQ yageze i Kigali aho yitabiriye igitaramo cya Seka Live isoza uku kwezi.
Guhera mu ntangiriro z’umwaka wa 2020 Arthur Nation isanzwe itegura ibirori bya Seka Live batangaje ko bigeye kujya biba buri kwezi. Muri uku kwzi hatahiwe icyatumiwemo Ndumiso Lindi wo muri Afurika y’Epfo n’umunya Nigeria Kenny BlaQ.
Akigera ku kibuga cy’indege i Kanombe, BlaQ a yakiriwe na Nkusi Arthur kimwe n’ikipe ya Arthur Nation.
Iki gitaramo cy’urwenya kizaba ku wa 29 Gashyantare. Ndumiso Lindi nawe uzataramira muri iki gitaramo byitezwe ko we agomba kugera i Kigali mu masaha make ari imbere kuri uyu wa Gatanu.
Aba banyarwenya baturutse hanze bazafatanya n’abakizamuka mu Rwanda barimo; Nimu Roger,Mercy, Patrick, Milly na Captain Father.
Kwinjira muri iki gitaramo kizabera muri Kigali Marriott Hotel bizaba ari 10 000 Frw mu myanya isanzwe na 20 000 Frw mu myanya y’icyubahiro.
Muri iki gitaramo itsinda ry’abacuranzi rya Neptune z Band ndetse na Nep Djs nibo bazaba basusurutsa abakunzi b’umuziki.

Title: Tonzi yashyize hanze indirimbo nshya yise “Hejuru ya byose”
Body:
Uwitonze Clementine benshi bazi ku izina rya Tonzi wamamaye cyane mu muziki wo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana, yashyize hanze indirimbo ye nshya yise “Hejuru ya byose”.
Uwitonze Clementine benshi bazi ku izina rya Tonzi wamamaye cyane mu muziki wo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana, yashyize hanze indirimbo ye nshya yise “Hejuru ya byose”.
Iyi ndirimbo nshya ya Tonzi yumvikanamo ubutumwa bwibutsa abantu ko hejuru y’ibiba byose ku Isi haba hari Imana iba iri hejuru.
Igitero cya mbere cy’iyi ndirimbo Tonzi agira ati“Hejuru y’ibyo twibaza tudafitiye ibisubizo, aho ubwenge ubuhangange n’imbaraga birangirira, ibyo twibwira ko twashoboye turasanga twarabishobojwe n’Imana umugenga wa byose uri hejuru y’ibituvuna, hejuru y’ibihe bihinduka”.
Iyi ndirimbo mu buryo bw’amajwi yakozwe inatunganywa na Camarade mu gihe amashusho yayo yo yafashwe akanatunganywa na Eliel Sando.
Tonzi ni umuhanzikazi ukunze guhamya ko yakuranye impano yo kuririmba aho yatangiye kuririmba akiri umwana muto cyane bagomba kuhagarika ku meza kugira ngo abantu bamubone. Impano yaje kwaguka ajya mu makorali atandukanye, mu mwaka wa 2004 atangira umuziki ku giti cye.
Ni umwe mu bahanzi b’igitsinagore baririmba indirimbo zihimbaza Imana umaze kwagura umwuga we mu buryo bukomeye.

Title: Itorero New Life Bible Church ryateguye igiterane cyizitabirwa n’abashumba bakomeye muri Afurika
Body:
Buri mwaka itorero New Life Bible Church ritegura igiterane gikomeye kandi kiri ku rwego mpuzamahanga cyiswe Refresh Africa Conference.
Buri mwaka itorero New Life Bible Church ritegura igiterane gikomeye kandi kiri ku rwego mpuzamahanga cyiswe Refresh Africa Conference.
Ni igiterane kiba gikubiyemo inyigisho zo guhemburwa k’umugabane wa Afurika ndetse no kuramya Imana kugira ngo habeho ubutumwa bw’impemburo.
Muri 2020, iki giterane giteganyijwe kubera kuri New Life Bible church guhera tariki ya 8 kugeza ku itariki ya 15 Gashyantare 2020.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye n’itangazamakuru kuri uyu wa Kabiri, Rev Dr Charles Mugisha Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Africa New Life Ministries na New Life Bible Church yavuze ko igiterane cy’uyu mwaka gifite umwihariko w’uko abantu bazahabwa inyigisho z’impemburo hagamijwe kugira umutwaro wo guhembura Afurika.
Yavuze ko hazabaho ibihe byihariye byo kuramya Imana byimbitse hifashishijwe abaramyi biteguye kandi bagiye kujya mu mwiherero ari nako barushaho gusenga kugira ngo hazabeho guhembuka byuzuye binyuze mu kuramya Imana.
Uyu mushumba kandi yavuze ko hatumiwe abakozi b’Imana batandukanye barimo Pasiteri Lincoln Serwaga ukorera ivugabutumwa mu Bwongereza uyu akaba ari mu bashumba bakomeye ndetse bajyanye ivugabutumwa ku byanyafurika bari muri diaspora.
Hari kandi abandi bavugabutumwa barimo Pasiteri James Kato,Pasiteri Chris Rue,Pasiteri Jide Laore,Pasiteri Ryan Holladay,ndetse na Pasiteri Charles Mugisha ari na we uzakira aba bakozi b’Imana.
Refresh Africa Conference ni igiterane kimaze imyaka itanu kiba, nkuko bitangazwa n’ubuyobozi bukaba buvuga ko cyahembuye imitimba ya benshi muri iyo myaka yose yewe ngo hari n’ubuhamya butandukanye bugaragaza ko hari n’abakize indwara.

Title: Abahanzi bakomeye basusurukije abanya-Rubavu mu gitaramo cya Tour du Rwanda (Amafoto)
Body:
Abahanzi bakomeye mu Rwanda biganjemo ababarizwa mu nzu ifasha abahanzi ya Kina Music hamwe na King James, Bulldogg na Bruce Melodie bashimishije abanya-Rubavu mu gitaramo cya Tour du Rwanda.
Abahanzi bakomeye mu Rwanda biganjemo ababarizwa mu nzu ifasha abahanzi ya Kina Music hamwe na King James, Bulldogg na Bruce Melodie bashimishije abanya-Rubavu mu gitaramo cya Tour du Rwanda.
Ni igitaramo cyabaye kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 26 Gashyantare 2020, nyuma yisiganwa rya Tour du Rwanda 2020 ryavaga mu karere ka Rusizi-Rubavu aho Natnael Tesfatsion ukomoka muri Erythrée yegukanye ka agace akoresheje amasaha atanu, iminota 34 n’amasegonda 46, agahita anafata umwanya wa mbere ku rutonde rusange.
Iki gitaramo cyabereye mu karere ka Rubavu mu Ntara y’Uburengerazuba kuri Kivu Beach iruhande rwa Serena Hotel. Cyari cyitabiriwe n’umubare munini w’abakunzi b’umuziki biganjemo cyane cyane urubyiruko.
Cyahuriyemo abahanzi batandukanye bakomeye aho ku rubyiniro habanjeho abanyamerika Rob Drabkin washimishije benshi mu ndirimbo yaririmbwaga kera n’abana ivuga ngo ‘Mbe Kanyamanza keza’ yanzika n’izindi ze yicurangira guitar, ibintu byanejeje abatari bake.
Yakurikiwe n’umuraperi S-Wrap nawe wishimiwe cyane, uyu azwi cyane mu Rwanda kubera Remix y’indirimbo ya Igor Mabano bahuriyemo y’iyitwa ‘Back’.
Aba bakurikiwe na Nel Ngabo washimishije abari bitabiriye mu ndirimbo ze zitandukanye zirimo ‘Byakoroha’, ‘Why’, ‘Nzahinduka’ ageze ku yitwa ‘Ya motema’ ahamagara Platini wahoze muri Dream Boyz ubu wiyise P, aba ari nayo asorezaho.
Davis D uri mu bahanzi bakunzwe nawe yashimishije abari bitabiriye iki gitaramo mu ndirimbo ze zitandukanye zirimo ‘Biryogo’, ‘Soso’, ‘Like You’ yahuriyemo na Seyn na Kevin Kade, ‘Sexy’ asoreza kuri Dede yahagurukije benshi.
Uyu muhanzi akimara gusoza kuyiririmba yahise ava ku rubyiniro ariko abantu bakavugira mu matamatama ko bibaye byiza yayisubiramo, cyane ko iri mu zigezweho mu Rwanda cyane mu rubyiruko ari narwo rwinshi rwari rwitabiriye.
Yakurikiwe na Igor Mabano waririmbye indirimbo ze zitandukanye zirimo ‘Back’, ‘Iyo Utegereza’, ‘Dear Mashuka’ yafashijwemo na Rob Drabkin n’izindi.
Bulldogg niwe wakurikiye uyu muhanzi, yishimirwa bikomeye mu bihangano bye bitandukanye. Yaririmbye indirimbo ze zirimo ‘Cinema’, ‘Nk’umusaza’, ‘Kaza Roho’ na ‘Mpe Enkoni’.
Bruce Melodie wakurikiye uyu muraperi yinjiriye ku rubyiniro mu ndirimo yise ‘Ndumiwe’ ahita yanzika n’izindi zirimo ‘Fresh’ igezweho muri iki gihe, ‘Ikinya’, ‘Katerina’ asoreza kuri ‘Kungola’ yahagurukije abantu hafi ya bose bari bitabiriye.
Bruce Melodie yakurikiwe na Butera Knowless waje ku rubyiniro imvura isa n’ishaka kugwa ariko nawe yishimirwa mu bihangano bitandukanye ahamya ibigwi nk’umwe mu bategarugori bafite izina rikomeye kandi bamaze igihe kinini mu muziki.
Yaririmbye indirimbo zitandukanye zirimo ‘Baramushaka’, ‘Yuda’, ‘Sweet Mutima’, ‘Nkoraho’ asoreza kuri ‘Day to Day’. Buri ndirimbo yose yaririmbye yafashwaga n’abana, ndetse gututumba kw’imvura kwabaye nk’ukuvaho n’ibijojoba byayo birashira maze abantu babyina birekuye.
King James niwe wasoje iki gitaramo yishimirwa by’ikirenga kurusha abandi bose bari bamubanjirije.
Uyu musore umaze igihe kinini ari umwe mu bafite igikundiro, yaririmbye indirimbo ze zitandukanye ahereye ku yitwa ‘Rasta’, ‘Agatimatima’, ‘Abo Bose’, ‘Ayo arya ni ayanjye’ yagezeho agahamagara ku rubyiniro Bulldogg bayihuriyemo akaza akamufasha.
King James yashyize ubushyuhe mu bari bitabiriye iki gitaramo ubwo yanzikaga n’indirimbo zibyinitse zirimo ‘Kuko turi kumwe’, ‘Umuriro watse’, ‘Ganyobwe’ ndetse na ‘Ndagutegereje cyane’ yasorejeho.
Muri iki gitaramo hari umwanya wo gupima ku buntu virusi itera sida n’izindi ndwara, hakanatangwa inyigisho zitandukanye zifasha abaturage kubungabunga ubuzima bwabo.
By’umwihariko hatangiwemo ubutumwa bujyanye no kwirinda indwara ya Coronavirus imaze iminsi ihitana abantu mu bice bitandukanye by’Isi by’umwihariko mu Bushinwa cyane ko ari naho yatangiriye.
Biteganyijwe igitaramo nk’iki kiza kubera no mu karere ka Musanze mu Majyaruguru kuri uyu we Kane tariki 27 Gashyantare 2020 ndetse no mu Mujyi wa Kigali kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki ya 29 Gashyantare 2020 muri Kigali Car Free Zone.

Title: Abagura mbere amatike y’igitaramo cyo gushimira Cécile Kayirebwa bagabanyirijwe
Body:
Abashinzwe gutegura igitaramo ‘Ikirenga mu bahanzi 2020’ cyo gushimira umuhanzi wabaye indashyikirwa mu kwimakaza umuco nyarwanda abinyujije mu ndirimbo, bagabanyirije ibiciro abari kugura amatike mbere y’igitaramo.
Abashinzwe gutegura igitaramo ‘Ikirenga mu bahanzi 2020’ cyo gushimira umuhanzi wabaye indashyikirwa mu kwimakaza umuco nyarwanda abinyujije mu ndirimbo, bagabanyirije ibiciro abari kugura amatike mbere y’igitaramo.
Uyu mwaka, Cécile Kayirebwa azashimirwa mu gitaramo “Ikirenga mu bahanzi“ giteganyijwe tariki ya 8 Werurwe 2020, mu birori bizabera muri Kigali Conference and Exhibition Village (KCEV) hahoze hitwa Camp Kigali.
Kugeza ubu amatike ari kugura 20000 frw,10000 frw na 5000 frw ku batabashije kuyagura bifashishije Airtel.
Kugeza ubu amatike ari gucururizwa ahantu hatandukanye harimo ahakorera Serivise za Airtel muri Kigali nka Remera ku cyicaro gikuru , Nyabugogo na Nyamirambo.
Aya matike kandi agurirwa muri Camellia ku Gisimenti, UTC, CHIC na KBC, Simba Supermarket, no muri T2000 ahakorera Monaco, I Nyarutarama kuri Tenis Club, Simba yo mu Mujyi na Blues Coffee ndetse no muri gare yo mu Mujyi.
Ku bantu bari kugura amatike bakoresheje Airtel Money, itike igura ibihumbi 20 000Frw yashyizwe kuri 18000Frw mu gihe iya 10 000Frw iri kugura 9000Frw. Naho iya 5000Frw ikagura ibihumbi 4000Frw.
Uzagura tike kumunsi w’igitaramo Kwinjira mu myanya y’icyubahiro ni ukwishyura tike ya 25000 Frw (VVIP), mu gihe ahasanzwe azaba ari 15000 Frw (VIP) ndetse na 10000 Frw ahasigaye hose.
Ni ku nshuro ya mbere hagiye gutangwa ishimwe ku muhanzi watoranyijwe nk’Ikirenga mu Bahanzi abikesha mu kwimakaza no guteza imbere ‘umuco nyarwanda abinyujije mu buhanzi.
Iki gitaramo kizitabirwa n’abahanzi barimo Muyango, Mariya Yohani, Mani Martin, Sentore Jules, Karasira Clarisse, Itorero Ibihame by’Imana, Mushabizi n’Ababeramuco.

Title: Joeboy watumiwe muri Kigali Jazz Junction yageze mu Rwanda
Body:
Umuhanzi wo muri Nigeria Joseph Akinfenwa Donus umaze kwamamara nka Joeboy yageze mu Mujyi wa Kigali aho ategerejwe mu gitaramo cya Kigali Jazz Junction gisoza Gashyantare 2020.
Umuhanzi wo muri Nigeria Joseph Akinfenwa Donus umaze kwamamara nka Joeboy yageze mu Mujyi wa Kigali aho ategerejwe mu gitaramo cya Kigali Jazz Junction gisoza Gashyantare 2020.
Mu ijoro ryo kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 26 Gashyantare 2020 nibwo Joe Boy yageze ku Kibuga Mpuzamahanga cy’Indege cya Kigali i Kanombe.
Igitaramo cya Kigali Jazz Junction giteganyijwe ku wa Gatanu tariki 28 Gashyantare 2020. Cyatumiwemo Joeboy uzafatanya na Davis D ugezweho muri iyi minsi kubera indirimbo ye “Dede” na Niyo Bosco wagaragaje ko nubwo afite ubumuga bwo kutabona impano ye y’umuziki ari ikirenga.
Niyo Bosco agezweho mu ndirimbo ye ya mbere yasohoye mu minsi ishize akayita “Ubigenza ute?” na "Ibanga" aherutse gushyira hanze.
Joeboy ni umwe mu bahanzi bagezweho cyane muri Afurika muri iki gihe ndetse mu banyabirori bo muri Kigali baramuzi cyane kuko indirimbo ze zidasiba gucurangwa mu tubyiniro dutandukanye yaba muri Kigali no hanze yayo. Indirimbo ze zamamaye cyane mu 2019. Aririmba cyane Afro Pop na R&B.
Uyu musore w’imyaka 22, yavukiye mu Mujyi wa Lagos muri Nigeria ku wa 21 Gicurasi 1997, akaba ari umwanditsi n’umuririmbyi. Abarizwa mu nzu ifasha abahanzi ya Gorilla Sauce Ent. Banku Music.
Yize muri Kaminuza ya Lagos izwi nka UNILAG aho yakuye impamyabumenyi mu bijyanye n’imicungire y’abakozi.
Joeboy yatangiye kuririmba ubwo yari afite imyaka 16. Ku myaka 17 akora indirimbo ye ya mbere yise ‘Gbeseyin’. Yasubiyemo ‘Shape of You’ ya Ed Sheeran yakirwa neza ndetse inatumbagiza izina rye ku rwego ruhambaye.
Uyu muhanzi akimara kuririmba iyi ndirimbo ya Sheeran yahise yemererwa na Mr Eazi ubufasha ndetse anamusinyisha mu nzu ye ifasha abahanzi ya Eazi’s "Banku" Music.
Mu ndirimbo yakoze zamenyekanye harimo ‘Baby’, ‘Beginning’, ‘All of You’ n’izindi nyinshi zatumye muri iki gihe abarirwa mu bahanzi bahagaze neza muri Nigeria. Amaze gukora album imwe yise ‘Love & Light’. Joeboy aherutse gusohoka ku rutonde rwa BBC rw’abahanzi bo kwitega mu 2020.

Title: James na Daniella n’abo bazafatanya bahishuye aho bageze imyiteguro y’igitaramo “Mpa Amavuta Live Concert”
Body:
Benshi bari bamaranye imyaka icyifuzo cyo kubona couple z’abaramyi zizwi mu muziki uhimbaza Imana zahuriye mu gitaramo kimwe. Izo nzozi zigiye kuba impamo, ibyifuzo bigiye gusubizwa binyuze muri James na Daniella bateguye igitaramo gikomeye kizabera muri Kigali Arena.
Benshi bari bamaranye imyaka icyifuzo cyo kubona couple z’abaramyi zizwi mu muziki uhimbaza Imana zahuriye mu gitaramo kimwe. Izo nzozi zigiye kuba impamo, ibyifuzo bigiye gusubizwa binyuze muri James na Daniella bateguye igitaramo gikomeye kizabera muri Kigali Arena.
Kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 26 Gashyantare 2020 ahazabera iki gitaramo habereye ikiganiro n’abanyamakuru bari kumwe na bamwe mu bahanzi bazabafasha barimo; Kavutse Olivier, Maya Fabrice, Papi Clever, Ben Serugo na Nkomezi Prosper.
Aba bahanzi bose bijeje abanyamakuru kuzakorera abakunzi babo igitaramo cy’amateka.
James asubiza umunyamakuru wari umubajije niba atari igitaramo cy’abashakanye gusa yagize ati ”Kuba abakundana ari bo bazacyitabira ni agace gato, ni igitaramo cyo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana, nutarubatse agomba kuzaza kwiga kuko kizanamurikirwamo album ibyo byose bireba n’abatubatse.”
James yavuze ko iki gitaramo kizatangira saa cyenda z’amanywa aho imiryango izaba ifunguye saa munani z’amanywa, saa munani n’igice kugeza saa cyenda bazaba bari gusenga, saa cyenda umuhanzi wa mbere azaba ageze ku rubyiniro kuko igitaramo kizarangira saa moya z’umugoroba.
Maya Fabrice mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru yashimiye Imana ko igitaramo cya mbere cya James na Daniella kigiye kubera muri Kigali Arena.
Ari James na Daniella cyangwa abahanzi bazafatanya bavuze ko imyiteguro y’iki gitaramo bayigeze ku musozo ku buryo biteguye kuzashimisha abazitabira iki gitaramo.
James na Daniella bafite igikundiro cyo ku gasongero mu bihebeye ibihangano byo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana, bateguye igitaramo gikomeye bahurijemo couple z’abaramyi zikunzwe mu gihugu.
Iki gitaramo cyiswe “Mpa Amavuta Live Concert” gitegerejwe kubera muri Kigali Arena ku wa 1 Werurwe 2020.
James na Daniella bagiteguye bagamije kumurika album yabo ya mbere bise “Mpa Amavuta’’ izaba iriho indirimbo umunani.
Cyatumiwemo abahanzi bakomeye barimo andi ma-couple azwi cyane mu muziki wo kuramya Imana arimo iya Ben na Chance; Tuyizere Papi Clever na Ingabire Dorcas; Maya na Fabrice na Amanda Fung na Kavutse Olivier babarizwa muri Beauty for Ashes.
Abazacyitabira kandi bazataramirwa n’abahanzi barimo Prosper Nkomezi uri mu bafite igikundiro, René Patrick, Ndayisenga Esron wamamaye muri True Promises na Gaby Kamanzi.
Couple ya James Rugarama na Daniella Mukiza ifitanye abana babiri. Ni imwe mu zakoze umuziki ukabasha kugera ku kigero nk’icyo uyu munsi bariho. Bavuga ko kuba indirimbo zabo ziri kwamamara cyane mu buryo bwihuse ari ubushake bw’Imana n’amasengesho yabo adasiba.
Mu minsi ishize babwiye IGIHE ko babanye igihe kinini babitsanya amabanga, nyuma bafata umwanzuro wo kugirana umubano w’urukundo no kuririmbana nka Couple.
Ni ku nshuro ya mbere James na Daniella bagiye gukorera igitaramo mu Rwanda, gusa si cyo cya mbere bakoze kuva batangiye umuziki kuko hari icyo bakoreye muri Uganda mu mpera za 2017.
Kwinjira muri “Mpa Amavuta Live Concert” ku bazagura amatike mbere ni 3 000 Frw, 15 000 Frw na 30 000 Frw ku bazagura amatike mbere mu gihe abazayagurira ku muryango bizaba ari 5 000 Frw, 10 000 Frw na 20 000 Frw.

Title: Yvan Buravan yasabye RIB gukurikirana umutekamutwe wamwiyitiriye uri kwiba abantu
Body:
Burabyo Yvan wamenyekanye cyane mu muziki w’u Rwanda nka Yvan Buravan kuri ubu uri kubarizwa ku mugabane w’u Burayi yasabye Ubugenzacyaha bw’u Rwanda gukurikirana umutekamutwe wamwiyitiriye akaba ari kwiba abantu.
Burabyo Yvan wamenyekanye cyane mu muziki w’u Rwanda nka Yvan Buravan kuri ubu uri kubarizwa ku mugabane w’u Burayi yasabye Ubugenzacyaha bw’u Rwanda gukurikirana umutekamutwe wamwiyitiriye akaba ari kwiba abantu.
Uyu mutekamutwe utaramenyekana ari kwifashisha imbuga nkoranyambaga yiyita Yvan Buravan ubundi akabwira abakunzi b’uyu muhanzi ko hari umushinga w’indirimbo ari gukorana na Diamond bityo akeneye ubufasha bwabo.
Uyu mutekamutwe abinyujije kuri Facebook yagize ati”Yvan Buravan ndabasuhuje kandi mbashimiye mbikuye ku mutima urukundo mukomeje kunyereka. Ariko ndamenyesha abafana banjye bw’umwihariko abakunzi banjye ko mfitanye umushinga na Diamond none nkaba mbasaba inkunga”.
Uwo mutekamutwe yanashyizeho nimero za telefone, asaba abamukurikira kumwoherereza ubufasha.
Uyu muhanzi akimara kubona ubu butumwa yahise abimenyesha Ubugenzacyaha bw’u Rwanda abasaba ko umuntu uri gukoresha iyi nimero yakurikiranwa cyane ko yamwiyitiriye kandi akomeje kwiba abantu ibyabo.
Yagize ati "Niba ari MTN cyangwa RIB ndabasaba kunkiza iyi nimero n’uyikoresha kuko si njyewe, nagiye numva inkuru nyinshi mbi z’abibeshye ko ari njyewe uyikoresha."
Yvan Buravan ari ku mugabane w’Uburayi nyuma yuko tariki 14 Gashyantare 2020 yataramiye muri Suède, nyuma y’igitaramo akaba yarakomeje gahunda ze bwite mbere yuko agaruka mu Rwanda.

Title: TMC yerekeje muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika
Body:
Mujyanama Claude uzwi nka TMC wo mu itsinda rya Dream Boys ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 25 Gashyantare 2020 yerekeje muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika bibyutsa amarangamutima y’abatekereza ko agiye ubutazagaruka akaba atumye itsinda rigiye gusenyuka.
Mujyanama Claude uzwi nka TMC wo mu itsinda rya Dream Boys ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 25 Gashyantare 2020 yerekeje muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika bibyutsa amarangamutima y’abatekereza ko agiye ubutazagaruka akaba atumye itsinda rigiye gusenyuka.
Kuva mu minsi ishize umwuka wagiye uba mubi mu itsinda rya Dream Boys, abakurikiranira hafi iby’umuziki bagahamya ko iri tsinda riri mu marembera.
Uyu mwuka wazamutse ubwo TMC yari amaze kumurika igitabo cy’ubushakashatsi yari yarakoze arangiza icyiciro cya gatatu cya Kaminuza. Iki gihe mu kiganiro na IGIHE yavuze ko yifuza gukomeza amasomo ye ariko byaba byiza akiga hanze y’u Rwanda.
Nyuma y’aya magambo abantu banyuranye batangiye kubona ko abagize Dream Boys badahuje intego ndetse bitizwa umurindi nuko nyuma buri wese muri iri tsinda yatangiye kwikorana umuziki ku giti cye.
Platini yahinduye izina yitwa P uyu akaba yarasohoye indirimbo zinyuranye wenyine atari kumwe na TMC mu gihe n’undi nawe hari izo yakoze wenyine.
Muri iyi minsi Platini ari kugaragara wenyine mu kazi ka Tour du Rwanda aho ari gukorana na CANAL+ benshi bari batangiye kwibaza igihatse ibi byose.
 Kugeza ubu TMC yamaze kwerekeza muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, hakaba hari n’amakuru ahamya ko uyu muhanzi atazagaruka mu Rwanda ukundi ahubwo agiye gushaka uko yakomerezayo amasomo ye.
Icyakora ubwo yahagurukaga i Kanombe TMC yagiranye ikiganiro kigufi na IGIHE ashimangira ko agiye muri Amerika ariko atagiye burundu.
Uyu muhanzi yagize ati” Ngiye muri Amerika muri gahunda zanjye, mugenzi wanjye Platini arabizi yewe ntanikibazo na kimwe gihari.”
Yakomeje agira ati” Gahunda zanjye nizirangira nzagaruka kandi si cyera, wenda bizanafata icyumweru kimwe.”
Gusa nubwo TMC avuga ko atagiye guhera muri Amerika ku mbuga nkoranyambaga benshi siko babifata bitewe nuko umwuka wari uhagaze mu itsinda.
Dream Boys ni itsinda ry’umuziki rigizwe n’abasore babiri aribo Mujyanama Claude uzwi nka TMC ndetse na Nemeye Platini wamenyekanye nka Platini.
Aba basore bamaze imyaka irenga icumi bakorana umuziki bakunzwe mu ndirimbo zinyuranye cyane ko bafite album zirenga esheshatu zose zamaze gusohoka ndetse bamurikiye abakunzi babo.

Title: Niyo Bosco yashimiye Adrien Misigaro wamufashije gukora indirimbo “Ibanga”
Body:
Niyo Bosco wasohoye indirimbo nshya yise “Ibanga” yashimiye bikomeye Misigaro Adrien wamufashije mu ikorwa ry’iyi ndirimbo.
Niyo Bosco wasohoye indirimbo nshya yise “Ibanga” yashimiye bikomeye Misigaro Adrien wamufashije mu ikorwa ry’iyi ndirimbo.
Uyu muhanzi ukomeje kwigarurira imitima ya benshi mu kiganiro na IGIHE yagize ati” Ndashimira Adrien Misigaro, ku bufasha yampaye mu ikorwa ry’iyi ndirimbo yaramfashije ndamushimira cyane.”
Uyu muhanzi ntabwo nyigeze atangaza ubwoko bw’impano Misigaro yamuhaye.
Niyo Bosco yongeye gusaba Abanyarwanda kumukundira impano afite mu muziki aho kumugirira impuhwe kubera ikibazo afite cyo kuba afite ubumuga bwo kutabona.
Ati” Ndabasaba ko bakumva ibihangano byanjye bagakunda impano yanjye ntibankundire ibindi cyangwa ngo bumve ko bankunze kubera impuhwe z’ikibazo mfite.”
Adrien Misigaro washimiwe cyane na Niyo Bosco ni umuhanzi w’indirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana utuye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Indirimbo “Ibanga” ya Niyo Bosco ikubiyemo ubutumwa bukangurira abantu kugira ibanga, agaragazamo ingaruka zikunze kuba ku bantu batarigira.
Mu nyikirizo y’iyi ndirimbo uyu muhanzi agira ati”Ibanga ni igihamya cyemeza ko uri umwizerwa, kugira ibanga nibyo bishimangira ubupfura bwawe. Uko waba uri kose utagira ibanga amagambo uvugwa niyo menshi kurusha ayo avuga! Jya uvuga uziga […].”
Niyokwizerwa Bosco wamenyekanye nka Niyo Bosco ni umusore w’imyaka 20 y’amavuko ukora umuziki ariko afite ubumuga bwo kutabona.
Iyi ndirimbo ye nshya mu buryo w’amajwi yakorewe muri Uno Record ikorwa na Producer witwa Santana mu gihe amashusho yayo yafashwe akanatunganywa na Bagenzi Bernard uri mu bagezweho muri iyi minsi.

Title: Miss Nishimwe Naomie yasubije abamwibasiye kubera amanota yagize mu kizamini cya Leta
Body:
Nyuma y’uko amanota y’ibizamini bisoza amashuri yisumbuye agiye hanze, ku mbuga nkoranyambaga benshi bibasiye Nyampinga w’u Rwanda mu 2020 Nishimwe Naomie bamunenga kugira amanota make.
Nyuma y’uko amanota y’ibizamini bisoza amashuri yisumbuye agiye hanze, ku mbuga nkoranyambaga benshi bibasiye Nyampinga w’u Rwanda mu 2020 Nishimwe Naomie bamunenga kugira amanota make.
Uyu mukobwa yatorewe kuba Nyampinga w’u Rwanda mu mpera z’icyumweru gishize yambikwa ikamba mu birori byabereye mu Intare Conference Arena, asimbura Nimwiza Meghan.
Impamvu yo kwibasira uyu mukobwa ni uko ubusanzwe byari bimaze kumenyerwa ko benshi muri ba Nyampinga b’u Rwanda batsindaga ibizamini bya leta ku manota yo hejuru, ariko we yagize 13 mu Mibare, Ubukungu n’Ubumenyi bw’Isi.
Mu kiganiro Amahumbezi kuri Radiyo Rwanda, Nishimwe Naomie yabajijwe icyo avuga ku bantu bamunenze ko yagize amanota make mu kizamini cya leta.
Ati “Ntabwo ushobora kubuza abantu kuvuga, hari n’igihe wakora ibyiza n’ubundi bakavuga. Njye rero ubu ndi kureba ibikorwa byanjye nta kindi nitayeho […] biriya ni ahahise hanjye ubu ndi kubaho by’aka kanya, ndi kureba ubuzima ndi kubaho aka kanya.”
Abajijwe uko yakiriye amanota yagize, Nishimwe yavuze ko nawe atashimishijwe n’uko yitwaye mu bizamini bya leta gusa ko yabikoze nyuma y’igihe ahuye n’uburwayi bukomeye ku buryo ashimira Imana kuba akiriho.
 Ati “Uko mwabibonye nanjye niko nabibonye, sinishimiye amanota nagize, si impamvu ngiye gutanga ariko ubuyobozi bw’ikigo cyanjye burabizi. Umwaka nakozemo ikizamini ni umwaka narwayemo cyane nubwo ariko na none ntabigira impamvu. Byibuza ndashima Imana ko nkiriho.”
Nishimwe Naomie yigaga muri Glory Secondary School, yarangije mu mwaka wa 2019 mu ishami rya MEG.
Uyu mukobwa wegukanye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda mu 2020 muri uyu mwaka wa 2020 yari yiyamamarije mu Mujyi wa Kigali agaragaza umushinga wo kurwanya ukwigunga mu banyarwanda.

Title: Senderi Hit na Intore Tuyisenge basohoye indirimbo bakoze mu rurimi rw’Ikirashi
Body:
Abahanzi babiri bavuka mu Karere ka Kirehe aribo Senderi Hit na Intore Tuyisenge basohoye indirimbo iririmbwe mu rurimi shami ruzwi nk’Ikirashi mu rwego rwo kumenyekanisha uru rurimi banarurinda kuzimira.
Abahanzi babiri bavuka mu Karere ka Kirehe aribo Senderi Hit na Intore Tuyisenge basohoye indirimbo iririmbwe mu rurimi shami ruzwi nk’Ikirashi mu rwego rwo kumenyekanisha uru rurimi banarurinda kuzimira.
Iyi ndirimbo bayisohoye kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 21Gashyantare 2020 ubwo hizihizwaga umunsi mpuzamahanga w’ururimi kavukire. Uyu munsi ukaba warizihirijwe mu Karere ka Kirehe ahahawe umwanya ururimi shami rw’ikinyarwanda rukoreshwa na bamwe mu baturage bo mu Karere ka Kirehe ruzwi nk’Ikirashi.
Abaturage bakoresha uru rurimi bahawe umwanya baganira banabyina imbyino zitandukanye ziririmbwe muri uru rurimi rw’ururashi. Abaturage bahimbawe cyane nyuma yo kumva ko abahanzi babiri bakomoka muri aka Karere babakoreye indirimbo bise Ikirashi aho bafatanyije nabo mu kuyibyina.
Senderi yavuze ko iyi ndirimbo bayikoze bagira ngo bashimire leta ku iterambere imaze kugeza ku baturage bavuga ikirashi.
Yagize ati “Mbere 1994 abaturage bavuga Ikirashi bari babayeho nabi bamwe barwaye imvunja ibirenge bikitambika none ubu batujwe mu midugudu bahabwa agaciro ntabwo bakibayeho nka mbere.”
Yongeyeho ati “Ikindi twayikoze kubera uyu munsi mpuzamahanga w’ururimi kavukire kugira ngo abantu bareke kwibagirwa indimi zacu gakondo.”
Yavuze ko gufata amafaranga yabo bakayasohoramo indirimbo ari ukugira ngo bakomeze guteza imbere uru rurimi kugira ngo rwoye kuzima ahubwo abantu bakomeze baruvuge.
Intore Tuyisenge we yavuze ko bakimara kumenya ko uyu munsi mpuzamahanga uzizihirizwa mu Karere ka Kirehe barebye umusanzu batanga bagasanga bakwiye gukora indirimbo ishishikariza abantu gukomeza kwibuka ururimi rw’Ikirashi.
Ati “Iyo ururimi rutabungabunzwe rurazimira, njye na Senderi twahisemo rero gukora iyi ndirimbo kugira ngo turusigasire. Iyo tuvuze Ikirashi bimfasha kwibuka abakurambere bacu muri aka Karere tuvukamo kuko nirwo bavugaga nubwo twe tutagize amahirwe yo kurumenya neza.”
Tuyisenge yavuze ko bagiye kongera imbaraga mu kurusakaza kugira ngo rumenyekane cyane. Yavuze ko kuri ubu inyinshi mu ndirimbo ze azajya agerageza agashyiramo amagambo make y’ururimi rw’Ikirashi.
Abakuze bakoresha ururimi rw’Ikirashi bafite agahinda baterwa nuko abato batagishaka kurumenya ngo kuko ku ishuri batarukoresha bakibaza uburyo nibasaza ruzakendera bikabababaza.
IGIHE yaganiriye na bamwe mu barukoresha batubwira amagambo amwe namwe n’ibisobanuro byayo mu Kinyarwanda.
Gusuhuzanya mu Kirashi iyo ari mu gitondo bakoresha ‘Murayire ge, haba hacyeye bagakoresha ‘Aganda’ cyangwa ‘Musibire ge’ kubwira umuntu uti “Amakuru ki uvuga Agandi shi, Mwiriwe mute bavuga Mwasiba kurungi. Iyo ushaka kubwira umuntu uti uvuye he bakoresha Waruga hi, muryoherwe ni Munuriwe.
Ibice by’umubiri nk’izuru ryitwa Enyindo, ukutwi ni ugutwi, irisho ni ijisho, urutoki rw’insina ni Engemu, amasaka yitwa umugusha, amashaza akitwa ubushaza, ibishyimbo byitwa ibiharage, ibitoki ni ibitiki ihene ni Embuzi, inka ni Ente.

Title: Young Grace yavuze impamvu yabatirishije umwana we muri Kiliziya Gatolika kandi asengera mu rindi dini
Body:
Abayizera Marie Grace wamenyekanye nka Young Grace muri Hip Hop y’u Rwanda, mu minsi ishize yabatirishije umwana we mu Kiliziya Gatolika bitera urujijo abasanzwe bakurikira uyu muraperikazi uzwiho kuba asengera mu itorero ryitwa “River of Joy and Hope Ministries”.
Abayizera Marie Grace wamenyekanye nka Young Grace muri Hip Hop y’u Rwanda, mu minsi ishize yabatirishije umwana we mu Kiliziya Gatolika bitera urujijo abasanzwe bakurikira uyu muraperikazi uzwiho kuba asengera mu itorero ryitwa “River of Joy and Hope Ministries”.
Ku Cyumweru tariki 23 Gashyantare 2020 nibwo Young Grace yabatirishije umwana we Amata Anca Ae’eedah Ai ‘Diamante’ muri Kiliziya Gatolika mu Karere ka Rubavu.
Uku kubatirisha uyu mwana muri Kiliziya Gatolika kwa Young Grace kwateye urujijo abasanzwe bakurikirana uyu muhanzikazi cyane ko asanzwe ari umukirisitu usengera mu itorero riyoborwa n’umushumba Sultan Eric.
Ibi bigaragazwa n’uko mu Ukwakira 2019 uyu muhanzikazi yari yagiye guhesha umugisha umwana we mu itorero asengeramo.
Mu kiganiro na Young Grace yabwiye IGIHE ko we yahisemo kubatirisha umwana we muri Kiliziya Gatolika kuko nawe ariho yaherewe amasakaramentu.
Ati "Namubatirishije muri Kiliziya Gatolika kuko mu rugo bose ni abakirisitu bo muri kiliziya kandi nanjye ndi umugatolika, muri “River of Joy and Hope Ministries” nsengerayo kuko ahantu hose bavuga Imana bemera Yezu nahasengera ariko ndi umugatolika wemewe.”
Mu Ukwakira 2012 Young Grace yari yinjiye muri Islam, ahita ahabwa izina rya Housna. Icyo gihe yatangaje ko yinjiye muri Islam nyuma y’inyigisho yahawe na bamwe mu nshuti ze bo muri iri dini akumva ziramunyuze akemera guhinduka.
Guhera mu 2016 uyu muraperikazi yaje kuva muri Islam ajya muri “River of Joy and Hope Ministries”.

Title: Miss Akacu Lynca yambitswe impeta n’umusore bamaze igihe bakundana
Body:
Miss Akacu Lynca wabaye igisonga cya kabiri muri Miss Rwanda mu 2015 yambitswe impeta n’umusore uzwi nka Guy Alain bamaze igihe mu rukundo wamusabye ko yazamubera umugore undi nawe aremera.
Miss Akacu Lynca wabaye igisonga cya kabiri muri Miss Rwanda mu 2015 yambitswe impeta n’umusore uzwi nka Guy Alain bamaze igihe mu rukundo wamusabye ko yazamubera umugore undi nawe aremera.
Mu mpera z’icyumweru cyashize nibwo umusore witwa Guy Alain uririmba indirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana yafashe icyemezo cyo kwambika impeta Miss Akacu Lynca amusaba ko yazamubera umugore.
Abinyujije kuri Instagram ye Guy Alain yagize ati ”Byabaye, nateye ivi musaba ko twakomezanya urugendo arabyemera! Niba muzi Lynca muzi uburyo ndi umusore w’umunyamugisha, niba munzi muzi ukuntu ndi umunyamugisha kugira Lynca, niba mutuzi twese, muzi uburyo ndi umunyamugisha kubana na Lynca muri ubu buzima. Ndagukunda Lynca.”
Guy Alain ni umwe mu bagize itsinda rya muzika riririmba indirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza “Alive and Freed”, amaze imyaka hafi ine bimenyekanye ko akundana na Miss Akacu Lynca.
Miss Akacu Lynca ufite imyaka 23, yabaye igisonga cya kabiri cya Miss Rwanda akurikiye Uwase Vanessa Raïssa wabaye igisonga cya mbere. Bombi bari bagaragiye Kundwa Doriane watowe nka Nyampinga w’u Rwanda mu 2015.

Title: USA: Harvey Weinstein wamamaye mu gutunganya filimi yahamijwe ibyaha byo gufata ku ngufu
Body:
Urukiko rukuru rwo muri Leta ya New York muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, rwahamije Harvey Weinstein wamamaye mu gutunganya filimi muri Hollywood ibyaha byo gufata ku ngufu abagore n’abakobwa yakinishaga filimi.
Urukiko rukuru rwo muri Leta ya New York muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, rwahamije Harvey Weinstein wamamaye mu gutunganya filimi muri Hollywood ibyaha byo gufata ku ngufu abagore n’abakobwa yakinishaga filimi.
Urukiko rukuru rwo muri Leta ya New York rwamuhamije icyaha cyo mu rwego rwa mbere cyo guhatira imibonano yo mu kanwa, Miriam Harey wari umwungirije mu bijyanye no gutunganya filimi mu 2006.
Ni icyaha gihanishwa igihano kuva ku myaka itanu kugeza kuri 25 y’igifungo. Hari ikindi cyaha yahamijwe cy’umugore yafatiye muri Hotel y’i New York mu 2013 gihanishwa igihano kitari munsi y’imyaka ine.
Icyakora Weinstein w’imyaka 67 y’amavuko yahanaguweho ibindi byaha bitatu birimo bibiri bikomeye byo mu rwego rwa mbere byashoboraga gutuma afungwa burundu. Nyuma y’urubanza uwo mugabo yasubijwe mu buroko gufungwa by’agateganyo mu gihe ategereje isomwa ry’urubanza ku Itariki 11 Werurwe 2020.
Aracyakurikiranyweho ibyaha by’abagore babiri bo muri leta ya Los Angeles yafashe ku ngufu mu 2013. Abagore barenga 80 barimo ibyamamare mu gukina filimi n’abana bamusabaga ubufasha ngo abagire ibyamamare bashinja uyu mugabo kubakorera ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina.
Gukurikiranwa k’uyu mugabo byatijwe umurindi n’ubukangurambaga bwiswe MeToo bukangurira abagore kujyana mu butabera abagabo bakomeye bitwaza icyo bari cyo bagahohotera abagore.
Weinstein yamenyakanye cyane muri filimi yiswe Pulp Fiction yo mu 1994 ivuga ku byaha by’ubujura, iyitwa The English Patient yo mu 1996 na Shakespeare in Love 1998 zombi zivuga ku rukundo.
Haleyi, wakoraga kuri imwe mu mateleviziyo Weinstein yavuze ko yamuhohoteye ubwo yamutumiraga mu nzu ye iri Manhattan. Yatanze ubuhamya avuga ko yamujyanye ku buriri akamwikubaho. Ni mu gihe Mann yavuze ko yamusuzuguraga cyane mu mubano wabo utarimo imibonano mpuzabitsina kugeza ubwo amufashe ku ngufu mu 2013.
Michelle Simpson Tuegel uhagarariye abahohotewe, mu rukiko yavuze ko yizeye ko n’abandi bagore barakomeza kuzana abakora ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina mu nkiko.
Ati "Imbaraga umuntu yaba afite zose turi mu bihe bishya. igihe cya #MeToo kije gutamaza abakoresha imbaraga bafite mu guhohotera abagore."
Miriam Haley ubu ufite imyaka 42 y’amavuko avuga ko yahohotewe na Harvey ytwaje kumufasha kuguma mu kazi ke ko kumwungiriza. Yamufashe ku ngufu ku itariki 10 Nyakanga 2006.

Title: Riderman, Social Mula na Marina basusurukije abitabiriye igitaramo bakoreye mu Bubiligi (Amafoto)
Body:
Abanyarwanda n’inshuti zabo batuye, biga cyangwa bakorera mu Bubiligi no mu nkengero zabwo, tariki ya 22 Gashyantare basusurukijwe n’abahanzi bakunzwe mu Rwanda barimo Marina, Social Mula na Riderman.
Abanyarwanda n’inshuti zabo batuye, biga cyangwa bakorera mu Bubiligi no mu nkengero zabwo, tariki ya 22 Gashyantare basusurukijwe n’abahanzi bakunzwe mu Rwanda barimo Marina, Social Mula na Riderman.
Aba bahanzi bacurangirwaga na DJ Princess Flor wavanze indirimbo mu buhanga asanzwe azwiho, afatanyije na Dj Toxxyk wari waturutse i Kigali.
Social Mula niwe wabanje ku rubyiniro, akurikirwa na Marina hasoza Riderman basusurukije abantu bakabakaba igihumbi bari bitabiriye iki gitaramo biganjemo urubyiruko rwari rwaturutse mu gihugu cy’Ububiligi n’ibindi bituranye.
Iki gitaramo cyatewe inkunga na RwandAir, inafite ibiro i Bruxelles mu Bubiligi aho ikorera ingendo eshatu mu cyumweru, Kigali-Bruxelles, Bruxelles-Kigali, kuwa Kabiri, kuwa Kane no kuwa Gatandatu.
RwandAir yakoresheje tombola y’itike y’indege yo gutembera mu bice 29 iyi kompanyi ikoreramo ingendo, yegukanywe na Teta Armella.
Gutera inkunga iki gitaramo kwa RwandAir, ni imwe mu nzira yo kwereka Abanyarwanda batuye i Burayi ibyiza by’iterambere ry’u Rwanda by’umwihariko iyi sosiyete ikora ubwikorezi bwo mu kirere.
Iki gitaramo cyateguwe na Team Production imenyereye gutegura ibitaramo no guha umwanya abahanzi b’Abanyarwanda n’abandi banyafurika baturuka hirya no hino, ngo bagaragaze injyana y’iwabo, itewe inkunga na RwandAir.
Iki gitaramo cyabereye ahitwa Birmingham Place, 112 Rue de Birmingham Straat, 1070 Anderlecht ku wa 22 Gashyantare 2020, cyatangiye guhera saa mbiri z’umugoroba kigeza mu gitondo.

Title: U Butaliyani: Umuntu wa karindwi yishwe na Coronavirus
Body:
Ubuyobozi bw’u Butaliyani bwatangaje ko abantu barindwi aribo bamaze guhitanwa n’icyorezo cya Cronavirus, gikomeje guhitana benshi mu Bushinwa ariko cyageze no mu Burayi.
Ubuyobozi bw’u Butaliyani bwatangaje ko abantu barindwi aribo bamaze guhitanwa n’icyorezo cya Cronavirus, gikomeje guhitana benshi mu Bushinwa ariko cyageze no mu Burayi.
Ubuyobozi bw’u Butaliyani bwatangaje kuri uyu wa Mbere ko bwahagaritse amashuri, za kaminuza, inzu ndangamurage n’ibindi bikorwa bihuriza abantu hamwe nk’imikino y’umupira w’amaguru n’ibikorwa ndangamuco.
Ibiro ntaramakuru by’u Butaliyani, Ansa byatangaje ko umuntu wa karindwi yazize iyi ndwara, ikomeje kwibasira u Butaliyani bw’amajyaruguru.
Byatangajwe ko umuntu witabye Imana ari umugabo w’imyaka 80, wajyanwe mu bitaro mu cyumweru gishize mu mujyi wa Lodi, kubera indwara y’umutima nk’uko Reuters yabitangaje. Abaganga bavuga ko ashobora kuba yarandujwe Coronavirus n’undi murwayi.
Umubare w’abarimo guhitanwa n’iyi ndwara ukomeje kwiyongera, mu gihe umuntu wa mbere wahitanwe na Cornavirus mu Butaliyani yapfuye ku wa Gatanu.
Abayobozi bavuga ko mu Bushinwa abantu bamaze kwandura ari 77 269 naho abanduye hanze yabwo ni 2 271. Abamaze guhitanbwa nayo ni 2 596, barimo 33 bamaze kugwa mu mahanga.
Kugeza ubu abantu bamaze gukira ni 24 854.

Title: Itorero ry’igihugu Urukerereza ryakiriye abanyempano 100 bashya
Body:
Nyuma yo kuzenguruka igihugu hashakishwa abanyempano bashya bo kwinjira mu itorero ry’Igihugu Urukerereza bikarangira habonetse 151, kuri iki Cyumweru tariki 23 Gashyantare 2020 i Kabuga aho bari gukorera umwiherero, hatoranyirijwe 100 bamaze kwinjizwa muri iri torero.
Nyuma yo kuzenguruka igihugu hashakishwa abanyempano bashya bo kwinjira mu itorero ry’Igihugu Urukerereza bikarangira habonetse 151, kuri iki Cyumweru tariki 23 Gashyantare 2020 i Kabuga aho bari gukorera umwiherero, hatoranyirijwe 100 bamaze kwinjizwa muri iri torero.
Ijonjora ry’abanyempano ijana bazajya mu mwiherero w’Itorero Urukerereza ryabaye kuri iki Cyumweru i Kabuga aho bari bamaze iminsi mu mwiherero.
Bitunguranye umusaza w’imyaka 51 witwa Ntahontuye Jean Marie wo mu Murenge wa Cyumba mu karere ka Gicumbi ucuranga umuduri, yagaragaye mu bahataniraga kwinjira mu itorero ry’igihugu Urukerereza ndetse birangira anatsinze.
Mu itorero ry’Igihugu Urukerereza bashakaga abanyempano mu byiciro bitanu aribyo abakaraza, intore, abaririmbyi, abacurangisha ibikoresho gakondo n’imbyino z’abakobwa.
Aba banyempano 100 binjiye mu itorero ry’igihugu Urukerereza bari mu mwiherero w’iminsi itanu ugamije kubafasha gusobanukirwa icyerekezo cy’Itorero binjiyemo n’icy’Igihugu muri rusange, ukazasozwa ku wa Gatatu tariki 26 Gashyantare 2020.
Kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki 24 Gashyantare 2020 bari kumwe na Mutangana Steven uyobora ishami ry’Umuco muri Minisiteri y’Urubyiruko n’Umuco, basuye Urwibutso rwa Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ku Gisozi, banasura Ingoro y’amateka y’urugamba rwo guhagarika Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.

Title: Ibidasanzwe byaranze Miss Nishimwe Naomie ubwo yigaga mu mashuri yisumbuye
Body:
Nishimwe Naomie yambitswe ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020, izina ry’uyu mukobwa ryabaye ikimenyabose ritera ibyishimo abo mu muryango we inshuti n’abamumenyeye mu irushanwa, ku ishuri aho uyu mukobwa yize ho biba ibindi.
Nishimwe Naomie yambitswe ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020, izina ry’uyu mukobwa ryabaye ikimenyabose ritera ibyishimo abo mu muryango we inshuti n’abamumenyeye mu irushanwa, ku ishuri aho uyu mukobwa yize ho biba ibindi.
Nyuma yuko hamenyekanye Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020, twifuje kumenya uyu mukobwa guhera mu bwana maze biba ngombwa ko tujya ku ishuri aho yarangirije amashuri yisumbuye tugirana ikiganiro n’ubuyobozi bw’ikigo ndetse n’abanyeshuri babanye nawe.
Sibomana Alphonse, umuyobozi w’ishuri rya Glory Secondary School aho Nishimwe Naomie yize kuva mu wa kabiri w’amashuri yisumbuye kugeza arangije muri MEG (Maths-Economics-Geography) mu mwaka wa 2019, yabwiye IGIHE ko batatunguwe nuko uyu mukobwa yegukanye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda cyane ko ari umukobwa mwiza, uzi ubwenge kandi w’intangarugero mu myitwarire.
Yavuze ko Nishimwe ari umukobwa uzi kuvugira mu ruhame, bikaba imwe mu ndangagaciro zigishwa abanyeshuri babo kugira ngo bazagire icyo bigezaho mu buzima.
Yagize ati”Twe tugira Ministeri zitandukanye, harimo iy’umuco na siporo kenshi rero bakunda kugira amarushanwa y’abanyempano atuma abana bitinyuka bakagaragaza impano zabo, ishinzwe gutegura abanyeshuri kuzavamo abayobozi beza b’ejo hazaza iyi ikaba urebye ifasha abanyeshuri gutinyuka kuvugira mu ruhame, n’izindi. ”
Uyu muyobozi yavuze ko ubumenyi Nishimwe Naomie yakuye muri iri shuri aribwo bwamufashije no mu rugendo rwe rwo kuba Nyampinga w’u Rwanda.
Sibomana yabwiye IGIHE ko uyu mukobwa ubusanzwe imico ye yari nta makemwa ku ishuri cyane ko nta kosa yari yagafatiwemo iryo ariryo ryose ryari gutuma yatumwa nk’umubyeyi cyangwa akirukanwa.
Ati “Naomie yize hano kuva mu wa kabiri w’amashuri yisumbuye kugeza arangije, yari umukobwa uzwiho gusetsa cyane, nta makosa yakunze kumuranga mu buzima bwe bwo ku ishuri.”
Yavuze ko uyu mukobwa yari afite imyitwarire myiza ku buryo abarezi n’abanyeshuri bagenzi be babimukundiraga ndetse byatumye banamuba hafi mu rugendo rwe rwo kwiyamamariza kuba Nyampinga w’u Rwanda.
Mu bijyanye n’amasomo, umuyobozi w’iri shuri yavuze ko uyu mukobwa yatsindaga neza, ati” Dufite amanota tugenderaho twimura abanyeshuri, Naomie ntiyigeze asibira n’umunsi wa rimwe, urumva ko yatsindaga.”
Umuyobozi w’ikigo Nishimwe Naomie yizeho yavuze ko bakimenya ko uyu mwana ari muri Miss Rwanda bakanguriye abanyeshuri kumushyigikira yaba mu buryo bwo kumutora ndetse n’ubundi bwose bushoboka.
Isheja Ricky Junior uhagarariye abandi banyeshuri muri Glory Secondary School yabwiye IGIHE ko uyu mukobwa yari umuntu usetsa kandi uzi kubana n’abantu ku buryo ari umwe mu bari bishimiwe cyane mu kigo.
Ati “Nishimwe Naomie yari umukobwa ukunda gusetsa cyane, nimwiza cyane twamufataga nk’uwa mbere mu burang. Nibyadutunguye kuba yabaye Miss Rwanda.”
Umukundwa Keilla bucura bwo kwa Nishimwe Naomie na we wiga muri iki kigo mukuru we yanyuzemo, yabwiye IGIHE ko bishimiye cyane iyi ntsinzi.
Umukundwa wiga mu wa kane HEG (History-Economics -Geography) yavuze ko yaba mu rugo ndetse no ku ishuri bishimiye gutsinda kwa mukuru we wegukanye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020.
Ku ishuri yigagaho Nishimwe Naomie azwi nk’umukobwa w’uburanga ariko usetsa cyane ku buryo abanyeshuri hafi ya bose bari bamuzi.
Nishimwe Naomie si we wa mbere wegukanye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda avuye muri iki kigo cya Glory Secondary School cyane ko mu 2015 havuye na Kundwa Doriane.
Usibye aba bakobwa begukanye ikamba rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda ariko iki kigo kibitse andi Makamba nk’irya Lynca Akacu wabaye igisonga cya kabiri cya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda mu mwaka wa 2015.
Aha hize kandi Marie d’Amour Uwase Rangira wabaye igisonga cya gatatu cya Miss Rwanda 2016, Ndahiro Liliane wabaye Miss Congeneniality 2018 na Gaju Anitha witabiriye Miss Rwanda 2019.

Title: Miss Uwimana w’i Burundi yatunguwe n’ibirori bya Miss Rwanda abigereranya na Miss Universe
Body:
Miss University Africa Burundi, Uwimana Dative, witabiriye irushanwa rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020, yanyuzwe n’ibirori yabonye avuga ko agereranyije ntaho bitaniye n’ibyo ajya abona bya Miss Universe.
Miss University Africa Burundi, Uwimana Dative, witabiriye irushanwa rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020, yanyuzwe n’ibirori yabonye avuga ko agereranyije ntaho bitaniye n’ibyo ajya abona bya Miss Universe.
Ku wa Gatandatu tariki 22 Gashyantare 2020 nibwo habaye ibirori byo gutora Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020 ikamba ryambitswe Nishimwe Naomie imbere y’abafana benshi.
Ibi birori byari byitabiriwe n’abakobwa bafite amakamba y’ubwiza mu bihugu bitandukanye bifuje kwitabira Miss Rwanda ndetse banayikurikiranye imbonankubone.
Uwimana Dative Miss University Africa 2019 wari waturutse i Burundi mu kiganiro na IGIHE yagize ati ”Ibirori byari bimeze neza, urwego abategura irushanwa bagezeho ni ibintu byiza cyane, ni ikintu cyantangaje wagira ngo ni Miss Universe.”
Uyu mukobwa icyakora nubwo yashimye urwego rw’imitegurire n’uburyo iri rushanwa ryagenze yavuze ko ikintu cyazitonderwa ubutaha ari ikijyanye n’umwanya kuko byakererewe.
I Burundi aho uyu mukobwa aturuka baheruka gutora Nyampinga mu 2017 guhera 2018 kugeza ubu ntawo barongera gutora umukobwa uhiga abanda uburanga ku rwego rw’Igihugu.
Ibi birori byitabiriwe na ba nyampinga baturutse mu bindi bihugu baje kwihera ijisho umukobwa wegukana ikamba.
Usibye Uwimana hari na Nyampinga wa Tanzania, Sylivia Sebastian, watowe mu 2019; Oweditse Phirinyane wo muri Botswana; Rebecca Nana Adwoa Kwabi wo muri Ghana n’igisonga cye cya kabiri Princess Owusua Gyamfi; Miss Mariah Nyayeina wo muri Sudani y’Epfo na Oliver Nakakande wo muri Uganda.
Ikiganiro na Uwimana Dative wari waturutse i Burundi

Title: Tour du Rwanda 2020: Skol yifashishije The Ben mu gusangira ibyishimo n’abakunzi b’amagare (Amafoto)
Body:
Ibirori by’iminsi umunani by’Isiganwa Mpuzamahanga rizenguruka urwa Gasabo ku magare, Tour du Rwanda 2020, byatangiriye mu mihanda ya Kigali, Rwamagana na Kimironko.
Ibirori by’iminsi umunani by’Isiganwa Mpuzamahanga rizenguruka urwa Gasabo ku magare, Tour du Rwanda 2020, byatangiriye mu mihanda ya Kigali, Rwamagana na Kimironko.
Tour du Rwanda iri kuba ku nshuro ya 12 yatangiye kuri uyu wa 23 Gashyantare 2020, mu gace kegukanywe na Yevgeniy Fedorov ukinira Vino- Astana Motors yo muri Kazakhstan.
Uyu mukinnyi w’imyaka 20 yakoresheje amasaha abiri, iminota 44 n’amasegonda 59 ku ntera y’ibilometero 114.4. Ni we wa mbere wo muri Kazakhstan wegukanye agace muri Tour du Rwanda.
Usibye kuryoherwa n’igare, abitabiriye itangizwa rya Tour du Rwanda banataramanye n’abahanzi bahoza ku mutima.
Uruganda rwenga ibinyobwa bisembuye n’ibidasembuye rwa SKOL Brewery Limited Rwanda ruzaherekeza Tour du Rwanda, rwazirikanye abakunzi b’umuziki butegura igitaramo cyaririmbwemo na The Ben.
Mugisha Benjamin wamamaye mu muziki nka The Ben yataramiye ku Kimironko aho isiganwa ryasorejwe kuri iki Cyumweru. Yifashishije indirimbo ze zikunzwe cyane yashimishije abakunzi b’umuziki Nyarwanda n’abihebeye ibihangano bye by’umwihariko.
The Ben afatanyije n’ibihumbi by’abafana baririmbanye “Ndaje”, “Naremeye”, “Vazi (Vas-y)’’, “Fine girl” n’izindi bagaragaza ibyishimo.
Uyu muhanzi yanaririmbye indirimbo yahimbiye Skol, ishimagiza ibinyobwa by’uru ruganda.
The Ben azongera gutaramira abakunzi b’umukino w’amagare i Musanze ku wa 27 Gashyantare 2020, asoze ibitaramo bye ataramana n’abanyamujyi b’i Nyamirambo ku wa 29 Gashyantare 2020.
Skol ni umuterankunga wa Tour du Rwanda ndetse mu 2018 yasinye amasezerano yo gukomeza kuyitera ingabo mu bitugu mu myaka itatu. Niyo ihemba umukinnyi watwaye agace k’isiganwa ndetse aho gasorezwa hatangirwa ibinyobwa ku biciro bigabanyije ndetse abanyamahirwe bagatsindira ibihembo bitandukanye.
Kuva muri Nyakanga 2018, Skol ifasha ingimbi zo mu makipe yo mu Rwanda kwitoreza mu Bubiligi. Muri Tour du Rwanda 2020 ifitemo ikipe yayo ifatanyije n’Ikigo cya Adrien Niyonshuti kigamije kuzamura impano mu mukino w’amagare (ANCA).
Iyi kipe yitwa Skol Adrien Cycling Academy (SACA) ni nshya, iri ku rwego rwo gukina amarushanwa yo ku mugabane “continental’’, yashinzwe mu rwego rwo guteza imbere impano z’Abanyarwanda bakina umukino w’amagare.
Abakinnyi batanu bayihagarariye barimo Mugisha Moïse (Kapiteni), Habimana Jean Eric, Dukuzumuremyi, Hakizimana Seth na Nsengiyumva Shemu.
Uretse Tour du Rwanda 2020, SACA iteganya kwitabira andi masiganwa arimo Tour de l’Egypte, Tour de Limpopo, Tour du Cameroun, Tour du Sénégal n’ayandi atandukanye.
Mu Ukuboza 2019 nibwo Skol yatangaje ko iri ku rwego rwo kwenga ibinyobwa bifite ingano ya hegitolitiro ibihumbi 500 ku mwaka. Isanzwe ikora ibinyobwa bitandukanye birimo Skol Lager, Skol Malt, Skol 5, Virunga Mist, virunga Gold, Panache Lemon byose biboneka hirya no hino mu gihugu ku giciro cyiza.
