Title: Ikanzu ya Meghan, Shaddyboo, ikamba rishya: Udushya mu birori byo gutoranya Miss Rwanda 2020
Body:
Mu ijoro ryo kuwa Gatandatu tariki 22 Gashyantare 2020 nibwo hatanzwe ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020 ryegukanywe na Nishimwe Naomie, iri ryabaye ijoro rirerire ku bitabiriye ibi birori ariko nanone ryaranzwe n’ibintu byinshi bitandukanye.
Mu ijoro ryo kuwa Gatandatu tariki 22 Gashyantare 2020 nibwo hatanzwe ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020 ryegukanywe na Nishimwe Naomie, iri ryabaye ijoro rirerire ku bitabiriye ibi birori ariko nanone ryaranzwe n’ibintu byinshi bitandukanye.
IGIHE yakusanyije tumwe mu dushya twagaragaye muri uyu muhango wabareye kuri Intare Arena i Rusororo mu karere ka Gasabo.
Ubwitabire bw’abafana muri Miss Rwanda 2020
Ibirori byo gutanga ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020 byabereye kuri Intare Arena, nubwo atari hafi cyane yo mu mujyi rwagati ariko ntibyaciye intege abantu babyitabiriye kuko bari buzuye mu cyumba cyatangiwemo ikamba.
Imyanya yose yari irimo abantu kandi abafana mu mpande zose ariko bagaragaza umuriri wo gushyigikira abakobwa batandukanye bari bashyigikiye.
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Urubyiruko n’umuco, Edouard Bamporiki yatashye adasoje ibirori
Ibirori bya Miss Rwanda 2020 byitabiriwe n’abayobozi batandukanye barimo Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’amahanga Olivier Nduhungirehe ndetse n’Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Urubyiruko n’Umuco Bamporiki Edouard.
Mu buryo butunguranye saa sita z’ijoro zibura iminota mike Bamporiki Edouard yahagurutse asezera kubo bari bicaranye aritahira. Bamwe mu babonye uyu muyobozi agiye batekereje ko arambiwe n’ibi birori byatinze kurangira cyane ko byashyizweho akadomo saa saba n’igice z’igicuku.
Impaka zikomeye mu bagize akanama nkemurampaka mbere yo gutangaza Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020
Nyuma y’uko abakobwa icyenda bari bamaze gusezererwa, abakobwa 10 bari basigaye bakamurikira akanama nkemurampaka imishinga yabo abari bashinzwe kubaha amanota basabwe gufata akanya bakajya guteranya amanota bityo bagatangaza uwahize abanda ari na we wegukana ikamba.
Umwiherero w’abagize akanama nkemurampaka watinze ku rwego rwo hejuru kuko barengeje isaha mu mpaka zikomeye.
Nyuma yo kugaruka bazanye amanota ateranyije nabwo impaka zari zose nubundi ubona batarumvikana ku manota batanze. Nyuma y’izo mpaka hemejwe ko Nishimwe Naomie ari we wegukanye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020.
Ikanzu ya Nimwiza Meghan mu birori bya Miss Rwanda ni kimwe mu bitazava mu mitwe y’abakurikiye iri rushanwa
Nimwiza Meghan wari usanganywe ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2019 yari yitabiriye ibirori byo kuritanga, uyu mukobwa yaje yambaye ikanzu ndende kandi yagutse yatunguye benshi.
Usibye abatangajwe n’iyi kanzu na nyirayo kuyigenderamo byamutonze cyane ko byamusabaga kugenda ayifashe cyangwa afite itsinda ry’abamukikije bamufasha gutambuka itamuteze.
Kwicara yambaye iyi kanzu ni kimwe mu byagoye cyane uyu mukobwa umaranye umwaka ikamba rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2019.
Kutubahiriza igihe byatumye ibirori biba iminsi ibiri 
Byari byitezwe ko ikamba rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020 ritangwa tariki 22 Gashyantare 2020, icyakora bitunguranye iri kamba ryatanzwe nyuma y’amasaha hafi abiri ku wundi munsi.
Nta mpamvu n’imwe yateye ubu bukerererwe yigeze itangazwa icyakora imwe mu zagaragariye buri wese witabiriye ibi birori ni ugutinda kwemeza uwegukanye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020 byafashe isaha irenga.
Amasura mashya mu bagize akanama nkemurampaka
Batanu bari bagize akanama nkemurampaka ni Munyaneza James umunyamakuru wa The New Times ubifitemo uburambe, Ntarindwa Diogene Atome umunyarwenya w’icyamamare mu Rwanda, Umubyinnyi w’ikirangirire ku Isi Sherri Silver, Evelyne Umurerwa umaze igihe ari umunyamakuru mu kigo cy’igihugu cy’itangazamakuru ndetse na Mutesi Jolly wegukanye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2016.
Muri aba tumaze kuvuga hejuru, Ntarindwa Diogene uzwi nka Atome ndetse na Sherri Silver yari amasura mashya mu kanama nkemurampaka ka Miss Rwanda.
Ibirori byitabiriwe na ba Nyampinga bo mu bindi bihugu
Ibi birori kandi byitabiriwe na ba nyampinga baturutse mu bindi bihugu baje kwihera ijisho umukobwa wegukana ikamba.
Muri bo harimo Dative Uwimana waserukiye u Burundi muri Miss Africa University mu 2019; Nyampinga wa Tanzania, Sylivia Sebastian, watowe mu mwaka wa 2019; Oweditse Phirinyane wo muri Botswana; Rebecca Nana Adwoa Kwabi wo muri Ghana n’igisonga cye cya kabiri Princess Owusua Gyamfi; Miss Mariah Nyayeina wo muri Sudani y’Epfo na Oliver Nakakande wo muri Uganda.
Ni ubwa mbere abakobwa bo mu bindi bihugu batwaye amakamba bitabira kuri urwo rwego.
Bwa mbere abakobwa bari bambaye amakanzu yadodewe mu Rwanda
Abakobwa bahatanaga mu irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda mu birori byo gutanga ikamba bari bambitswe n’abanyamideri babiri aribo Tanga Design na Ian Boutique.
Eric Birasa uhagarariye Ian Boutique yabwiye IGIHE ko amakanzu abakobwa bose baserukanye ari imyambaro yadodewe mu Rwanda bikaba ari ubwa mbere bibaye mu gihe cy’imyaka itandatu amaze akora iki gikorwa cyo kwambika abakobwa bo muri Miss Rwanda.
Urubyiniro rwari ruteguye neza cyane kimwe n’icyumba cyabereyemo ibi birori
Buri wese winjiraga ahari hagiye kubera ibirori bya Miss Rwanda 2020 yatungurwaga n’uburyo hari hatatse neza cyane, byagaragaraga ko ari ibirori byiteguwe ku rwego rwo hejuru.
Usibye imitako, urubyiniro abakobwa bagombaga gutambukaho kimwe n’ibyuma byasohoraga amajwi byari ibintu biteguye neza kandi bivuga neza.
Shaddyboo yasize inkuru mu birori bya Miss Rwanda
Shaddyboo uzwi cyane ku mbuga nkoranyambaga yasize umugani ahabereye ibirori byo gutanga ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020. Uyu mugore wafanaga Nishimwe Naomie yabanje kukanyurizaho abitabiriye ibi birori ubwo akanama nkemurampaka kari kari guteranya amanota.
Ubwo akanama nkemurampaka kari kagiye guteranya amanota, Dj Ira wavangaga imiziki yaryohereje abitabiriye ibirori bya Miss Rwanda nubwo bari bananiwe bose bicaye.
Muri iki gihe Shaddyboo yatunguranye abantu bose bicaye arahaguruka acinya akadiho abantu bose bamuhanze amaso.
Ubwo bari bamaze gutangaza uwatsinze, Shaddyboo yongeye kwigaragaza cyane ko yarenzwe n’ibyishimo akavuza induru mu cyumba cyatorewemo Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020.
Ibirori byaranzwe n’imbyino n’umuziki gakondo kimwe n’imbyino za Kinyarwanda
Mu birori byo gutora Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020 hari hatumiwe itorero Inganzo Ngari ndetse n’itsinda ry’abacuranzi gakondo basusurukije abitabiriye iki gitaramo.
Usibye Itorero Inganzo Ngari, na ba Nyampinga mu myireko bakoze harimo aho biyerekanye babyina Kinyarwanda cyane ko bari bamaze igihe batozwa.
Nyuma y’imyaka itanu ikamba rya Miss Rwanda ryahinduwe
Ikamba ryambitswe Miss Nishimwe Naomie ryakozwe n’Inzu y’Ingoro Ndangamurage z’u Rwanda nyuma y’imyaka itanu iryari risanzwe rikozwe rikaba ryasimbujwe ku busabe bw’abategura iri rushanwa.
Ubwo Nimwiza Meghan yajyaga gutanga ikamba yari amaranye umwaka wose byamusabye kubanza gukuramo iryo yari asanganywe afata irishya aba ariryo yambika Nishimwe Naomie.

Title: Abanyarwanda basogongejwe ku muco wo muri Sénégal mu gitaramo kidasanzwe (Amafoto)
Body:
Abahanzi babiri bo muri Senegal, Faada Freddy na N’Dongo D basusurukije abitabiriye igitaramo Live & Unplugged cyabereye i Kigali, cyibanda ku kugaragaza umuco wo muri Senegal, mu burengerazuba bwa Afurika.
Abahanzi babiri bo muri Senegal, Faada Freddy na N’Dongo D basusurukije abitabiriye igitaramo Live & Unplugged cyabereye i Kigali, cyibanda ku kugaragaza umuco wo muri Senegal, mu burengerazuba bwa Afurika.
Iki gitaramo cyabaye kuri uyu wa Gatandatu muri Kigali Conference and Exhibition Village hamenyerewe nka Camp Kigali, cyatangiye saa moya z’umugoroba kirangira ahagana saa yine, cyitabirwa cyane cyane n’umubare munini w ’abanyamahanga.
Habanje DJ Juls ashyushya abari aho binyuze mu miziki yavangaga, irimo indirimbo nyarwanda n’inyamahanga, akanyuzamo agashyiramo izo muri Senegal by’umwihariko.
Nyuma ya DJ Juls hajeho itsinda Daara J Family rigizwe n’abagabo babiri, Faada Freddy na N’Dongo D. Ni itsinda rizwiho kurapa, rikomoka muri Senegal.
Iri tsinda ryashimishije abitabiriye iki gitaramo mu ndirimbo nyinshi baririmbye, cyane ko bamaze ku rubyinirino amasaha agera kuri abiri.
Bavuyeho hasubiraho DJ Juls umwanya muto, maze igitaramo gisojwe bakomereza mu kwishimisha.

Title: Incamake y’urugendo rwa Nishimwe Naomie mu irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda rwamuhesheje kwambara ikamba
Body:
Nishimwe Naomie yambitswe ikamba rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020 nyuma y’urugendo rukomeye yagiye anahuriramo n’ibizazane ariko byose akabirenga kugeza yegukanye ikamba.
Nishimwe Naomie yambitswe ikamba rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020 nyuma y’urugendo rukomeye yagiye anahuriramo n’ibizazane ariko byose akabirenga kugeza yegukanye ikamba.
Uyu mukobwa mu kiganiro yahaye abanyamakuru nyuma yo gutorwa, yavuze ko hari igihe cyageze agacika intege ku buryo yumvaga n’irushanwa nyirizina yaryihorera akivanamo.
Nishimwe Naomie wambitswe ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020 yaryinjiyemo yiyamamarije mu mujyi wa Kigali.
Akimara gutsindira guhagararira Umujyi wa Kigali, yahise atangira kwibasirwa ku mbuga nkoranyambaga ashinjwa kuba akorana bya hafi na MTN Rwanda bityo hakaba hari abagaragazaga impungenge z’uko iyi sosiyete yeteye inkunga Miss Rwanda 2020 yazagira uruhare mu itsinda rye.
Ari abategura iri rushanwa cyangwa ubuyobozi bwa Miss Rwanda bose bavuze ko uyu mukobwa kwinjira mu irushanwa nta tegeko yishe ndetse arimo mu buryo bwubahirije amategeko.
Bose bahumurije abakurikirana iri rushanwa bababwira ko kuba uyu mukobwa hari uburyo yakoranye na MTN Rwanda ntacyo byamwongereraho.
Nyuma yo guhagararira Umujyi wa Kigali, Nishimwe Naomie mu ijonjora ry’ibanze yaserukanye umushinga wo kurwanya indwara y’agahinda gakabije (Depression).
Uyu mushinga waherekeje Nishimwe Naomie kugeza umuhesheje ikamba rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda w’umwaka wa 2020 yambitswe mu birori byabaye mu ijoro ryo kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 22 Gashyantare 2020.
Usibye ikamba rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda Nishimwe Naomie yegukanye ikamba ry’umukobwa uberwa n’amafoto wahembwe na Bella Flowers yamugeneye 1 200 000frw.
Nishimwe Naomie yayoboye abandi bakobwa mu majwi kuva mu ijonjora ry’ibanze kugeza ku munsi wa nyuma w’irushanwa yarushaga abandi bakobwa amajwi yaba kuri Internet no mu buryo bwa SMS.
Ikamba rya Miss Rwanda Nishimwe Naomie yegukanye ryamuhesheje kwegukana ibihembo binyuranye. Nka Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020 yagenewe imodoka nshya yo mu bwoko bwa Suzuki Swift 2019 yatanzwe na Suzuki binyuze muri Rwanda Motor ifite agaciro ka miliyoni 18 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda.
Yemerewe kandi umushahara w’ibihumbi 800 Frw ku kwezi mu gihe cy’umwaka, aya akazatangwa na Africa Improved Foods.
Nyampinga w’u Rwanda yemerewe kwivuza ku buntu ku ivuriro ryitwa Ubuzima Polyclinique no gusohokera muri Camellia agafata icyo ashaka mu gihe kingana n’umwaka azamarana ikamba.
Yemerewe itike y’indege izamujyana i Dubai n’ibindi byose bijyanye n’urugendo azakora mu rwego rw’ikiruhuko, iyi ikazatangwa na kompanyi yitwa Multi Design Group.
Keza Salon yemeyeko izamukorera ibijyanye n’imisatsi ndetse no kwita ku bwiza bwe mu gihe cy’umwaka wose.
Yemerewe gucapirwa inyandiko zose ku buntu ku bintu byose azaba ashaka muri Smart Design, mu gihe True Connect yo yamwemereye internet y’umwaka ku buntu.
Mu gihe agiye mu birori, uyu mukobwa azajya yambikwa na Ian Boutique ku buntu ahabwe n’imyenda ya Siporo y’ubuntu muri Magasin Sport Class.
Umukobwa wegukanye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda buri mwaka ahita anatsindira itike yo guhagararira igihugu muri Miss World.
Ishimwe Naomie wegukanye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020 ni umwana w’imyaka 21 upima metero 1.70 akaba yari yambaye nimero 31 mu irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020.

Title: Nishimwe Naomie yegukanye ikamba rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020 (Amafoto na Video)
Body:
Ikamba rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020 ryambitswe Nishimwe Naomie winjiye mu irushanwa ahagarariye Umujyi wa Kigali, Igisonga cya Kabiri cyabaye Umutesi Denise [No43] naho Igisonga cya mbere ni Umwiza Phionah [No47].
Ikamba rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020 ryambitswe Nishimwe Naomie winjiye mu irushanwa ahagarariye Umujyi wa Kigali, Igisonga cya Kabiri cyabaye Umutesi Denise [No43] naho Igisonga cya mbere ni Umwiza Phionah [No47].
Nishimwe Naomie yegukanye ikamba rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda w’umwaka wa 2020, asimbura Nimwiza Meghan wari ufite iriheruka yambitswe muri Gashyantare 2019.
Uyu mukobwa w’imyaka 20 yatowe mu birori byabereye mu Intare Conference Arena i Rusororo ku mugoroba wo ku wa 22 ushyira mu rukerera rwo ku wa 23 Gashyantare 2020. Nishimwe yabaye Nyampinga wa munani utowe mu mateka y’u Rwanda.
Urugendo rwo guhitamo Nyampinga w’u Rwanda rwari rumaze iminsi 64 kuva ku ijonjora ry’ibanze ryabereye mu Karere ka Rubavu ku wa 21 Ukuboza 2019.
Nishimwe yagizwe Nyampinga hagendewe ku kimero n’ubwiza, kugira ubumenyi kurusha abandi ndetse n’umuco nk’imwe mu nkingi z’ubuzima bw’igihugu.
Uyu mukobwa yahiriwe cyane kuko yanagizwe Nyampinga uberwa n’amafoto (Miss Photogenic).
Abakobwa 20 [baje kuvamo umwe] b’ikimero bageze mu cyiciro cya nyuma cy’irushanwa batoranyijwe muri 54 batsinze amajonjora yabereye mu ntara zose z’igihugu aho abagera kuri 400 bari biyandikishije.
Mu byashingiweho batoranya Nyampinga harebwe uburanga (amanota 30%), ubuhanga mu kuvuga (amanota 40%) n’uko umukobwa yiyerekanye (amanota 30%) byose bikagira igiteranyo cy’amanota ijana.
UKO IRUSHANWA RYAGENZE UMUNOTA KU WUNDI:
 	Amafoto y’abakobwa bahawe amakamba
01: 30: NISHIMWE NAOMIE w’imyaka 20 wiyamamarije ku itike y’Umujyi wa Kigali ni we wagizwe Nyampinga w’u Rwanda asimbuye Nimwiza Meghan wari ufite irya 2019.
Mu ijambo rye yagize ati “Ndishimye cyane. Ndashimira Abanyarwanda bangiriye icyizere.’’
Nishimwe yasazwe n’ibyishimo nyuma yo gutangazwa ko ariwe wegukanye ikamba rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020. Ababyeyi n’abavandimwe be bamusanze ku rubyiniro barishimana.
Uyu mukobwa yahise anashyikirizwa urufunguzo rw’imodoka yo mu bwoko bwa Suzuki Swift yagenewe. Iyi modoka nshya (Zero Kilometre) yatanzwe na Suzuki binyuze muri Rwanda Motor.
Nishimwe yize ibijyanye n’Imibare, Ubukungu n’Ubumenyi bw’Isi (MEG). Ubwo yiyamamarizaga i Kigali ku wa 18 Mutarama 2020, Nishimwe yavuze ko nahabwa ikamba azita ku mushinga wo kugabanya agahinda gakabije mu rubyiruko (depression).
Icyo gihe yagize ati "Urubyiruko rukunze kugira depression rukirukira mu biyobyabwenge rukaniyahura.”
 	Nishimwe yashyikirijwe imodoka nshya
Nishimwe wari ugaragiwe n’inshuti n’abavandimwe be, yahawe urufunguzo rw’imodoka nshya yemererwa nka Nyampinga w’u Rwanda.
 	Nishimwe yahogoje Abanya- Sénégal
Nishimwe Naomie usanzwe ari mu bakurikirwa cyane kuri Instagram ufite abarenga ibihumbi 65 kuri uru rubuga, yigeze no gutangarirwa ubwiza bwe ku mbuga nkoranyambaga Abanya- Sénégal bagaterana amagambo.
Uyu mukobwa asanzwe akurikirwa cyane [afite abantu ibihumbi 66.1 kuri Instagram] ndetse byagaragajwe cyane n’uburyo yahamagawe [ariwe wa nyuma] abantu bari bari mu cyumba cyabereyemo igikorwa cyo kujonjora bakiyamira.
Uretse ibyo, muri Kamena umwaka ushize muri Sénégal ubwiza bw’Abanyarwandakazi bwakuye benshi mu byimbo butuma bamwe bavugishwa, havuka iteranamagambo hibazwa igihugu gifite abakobwa beza hagati y’u Rwanda na Sénégal.
Icyo gihe ifoto ya Nishimwe Naomie yavugishije benshi bari batangariye ubwiza bwe. Ku mbuga zitandukanye muri Sénégal hakwirakwiye ifoto y’uyu mukobwa wari uhagarariye Abanyarwandakazi muri rusange hagereranywa ubwiza bwe n’ubw’abakobwa bo muri icyo gihugu.
Izi mpaka zakwirakwiriye ku mbuga za internet zitandukanye muri Sénégal, zatangiriye mu itsinda [Group] rya Facebook rikunzwe muri iki gihugu ryitwa ‘T’es De Dakar Si’ hibazwaga hagati y’u Rwanda n’iki gihugu ahari abakobwa b’uburanga.
Kuva ubwo havutse ibice bibiri muri iri tsinda, icya mbere cy’abagabo bo muri Sénégal bemeza ko ‘Abanyarwandakazi bafite uburanga burangaza benshi kurusha ubw’abakobwa bo muri iki gihugu’ mu gihe hari n’abakobwa batabyishimiye maze nabo bishyira hamwe bamagana ibyo basaza babo bavuze.

Nyampinga w’u Rwanda wa 2019, Nimwiza Meghan yicaye mu Intare Arena hamwe n’abandi ba nyampinga yasimbuye. Ategereje ko hatangazwa umukobwa agomba kwambika ikamba amaranye umwaka.
Ibi birori kandi byitabiriwe na ba nyampinga baturutse mu bindi bihugu baje kwihera ijisho umukobwa wegukana ikamba.
Muri bo harimo Dative Uwimana waserukiye u Burundi muri Miss Africa University mu 2019; Nyampinga wa Tanzania, Sylivia Sebastian, watowe mu mwaka wa 2019; Oweditse Phirinyane wo muri Botswana; Rebecca Nana Adwoa Kwabi wo muri Ghana n’igisonga cye cya kabiri Princess Owusua Gyamfi; Miss Mariah Nyayeina wo muri Sudani y’Epfo na Oliver Nakakande wo muri Uganda.

Umunyamakuru ubifitemo uburambe Munyaneza James akaba akorera The New Times wari wagiriwe icyizere muri Pre-Selection yongeye kugarukamo.
Hinjiyemo kandi amaraso mashya nka Ntarindwa Diogène umunyarwenya wamenyekanye cyane nka Atome mu Rwanda.
Umubyinnyi mpuzamahanga w’Umunyarwandakazi Sherrie Silver kuri iyi nshuro yinjiye mu kanama nkemurampaka.
Aba ni bo bagomba gutanga amanota aza gutanga Nyampinga w’u Rwanda. Kugira ngo umukobwa yegukane ikamba haragenderwa ku bintu bitatu aribyo; Uburanga, Ubwenge n’Umuco.
Ntalindwa Diogène wavuze mu izina ry’abagize akanama nkemurampaka ka Miss Rwanda 2020 yavuze ko ubwiza butanga amanota 30, umushinga w’umukobwa ugatanga amanota 40 n’umuco ukabarirwa ku manota 30.
20:47: Abakobwa bahamagawe ku rubyiniro imbere y’Akanama Nkemurampaka. Aba bakobwa bambaye amapantalo y’umukara n’imipira y’umukara ya Miss Rwanda. Hari guseruka babiri babiri, abafana bari kubakiriza amashyi y’urufaya n’induru nyinshi ku buryo byagorana kumenya ushyigikiwe cyane.
Mu byo bari kugaragaza harimo ibyo batojwe mu gihe cy’umwiherero bamazemo ibyumweru bibiri.
Video: Uko abakobwa baserutse muri Miss Rwanda 2020
20:33: Abashyushyarugamba b’ibi birori bageze ku rubyiniro
Abanyamakuru Nzeyimana Luckman na Martina Shami Abera bakora kuri KC2, Ishami rya kabiri rya Televiziyo y’u Rwanda batanze ikaze ku bitabiriye ibirori bya Miss Rwanda.
Batangiye bavuga uko urugendo rwo guhitamo abakobwa rwatangiye kugeza uyu munsi wanone, hasigayemo 19 bahataniye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020.
 	Ba Nyampinga bafite amakamba y’umwaka ushize biteguye kutayanga
Abakobwa begukanye amakamba mu mwaka ushize biteguye kuyashyikiriza bagenzi babo bari buseruke neza.
Uhereye ibumoso hari Mwiseneza Josiane wabaye Miss Popularity 2019, Kabahenda Ricca Michaella wabaye Nyampinga w’Umuco 2019, Muyango Claudine wahawe ikamba rya Nyampinga uberwa n’amafoto 2019, Uwase Sangwa Odille wabaye Igisonga cya Kabiri 2019 na Uwihirwe Yasipi Casimir wabaye Igisonga cya Mbere 2019.
 	 Video: Uko byari byifashe mbere yo gutangira ibirori byo gutanga ikamba rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020
 	Ibyamamare byitabiriye Miss Rwanda ku bwinshi
Ibyamamare mu ngeri zitandukanye byatangiye kugera mu cyumba kigiye kuberamo irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020.
Ijisho ry’umufotozi wa IGIHE ryabonye bamwe barimo Umunyarwandakazi Sherrie Silver umaze kubaka izina mu mbyino ku Isi yose.
 	Nishimwe Naomie yasoje amatora ari ku isonga
Mu matora yaba ayo kuri nternet no kuri SMS yarangiye saa moya z’umugoroba kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 22 Gashyantare 2020. Yarangiye Nishimwe Naomie ariwe uyoboye abandi mu majwi.
Kuri internet Nishimwe Naomie yabaye uwa mbere n’amajwi 92 756 naho kuri SMS ayoboye abandi n’amajwi 79 756.
 	Umuteguro ni wose, umuziki ukomeje kubyinwa
19:53: Abafana benshi bamaze kwinjira mu Intare Conference Arena. Umuriri uri hejuru cyane, amajwi y’abafana ari kumvikana baririmba amazina y’abakobwa bari inyuma.
Urubyiniro abakobwa bahagararaho basobanura imishinga yabo rwateguwe, rwarimbishijwe n’indabo nziza ziri mu mabara atandukanye.
Muri aka kanya ibirori ntibiratangira, Iradukunda Grace Divine [Dj Ira] ni we uri gususurutsa abaje kureba Miss Rwanda 2020 mu miziki itandukanye irimo iy’Abanyarwanda n’iyo muri Amerika.
 	Imodoka ihabwa Nyampinga w’u Rwanda yagejejwe mu Intare Arena
Imodoka ihabwa Miss Rwanda 2020 yagejejwe mu Intare Arena, mbere yuko ibirori bitangira imodoka yo mu bwoko bwa Suzuki Swift ihembwa Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020 yamaze kwinjizwa ahari kubera ibi birori itwikiriwe.
Iyi modoka ifite agaciro ka miliyoni 18 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda yatanzwe n’Uruganda rwa Africa Improved Foods ari nayo izahemba Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 800 000 Frw buri kwezi mu gihe cy’umwaka azamarana ikamba.
 	Intare Arena niyo Nimwiza Meghan yambikiwemo ikamba amaranye umwaka
Inyubako ya Intare Arena niyo yakiriye ibirori byatangiwemo ikamba rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda wa 2019, ryegukanywe na Nimwiza Meghan ku mugoroba wo ku wa 26 Mutarama 2019.
 	Rwarutabura wa Rayon Sports ashyigikiye Umutesi Denise
Ngenzahimana Bosco [Rwarutabura]umenyerewe nk’umufana ukomeye wa Rayon Sports ari mu bashyigikiye Umutesi Denise [No43].
Rwarutabura witabiriye Miss Rwanda avuye kwa muganga nyuma yo gukubitwa agakomeretswa ku mugoroba wo ku wa 21 Gashyantare 2020, yabwiye IGIHE ko yemeye kuza gushyigikira mushiki w’inshuti y’umuryango we.
18:30: Abantu batangiye kwinjira mu Intare Conference Arena ahagiye kubera irushanwa rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda. Hari gucurangwa indirimbo zitandukanye ari nako abafana benshi bazibyina bagaragaza akanyamuneza.
 	Ababyeyi, inshuti n’abavandimwe b’abakobwa bahatana babubekereye
Imihanda myinshi iri kwerekeza i Rusororo ku Intare Arena ahatangarizwa Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020.
Abitabiriye ibi birori bashyiriweho imodoka zibakura kuri Stade Amahoro i Remera zibageza i Rusororo.
Mu masaha ya saa Kumi n’imwe, abantu benshi bageze aho irushanwa ribera, baserutse bafite ibyapa biriho amazina y’abakobwa bashyigikiye bifuza ko aribo bakwambikwa ikamba.
Urebye ku maso yabo bifitiye icyizere, bambariye gushyigikira abakobwa babo no kuza kubabona bashinjagirana isheja bambikwa ikamba.
Usibye ibyapa, bambaye imipira iriho amazina n’amafoto y’abo bashyigikiye. Bicaye ahantu hamwe ku buryo umuriri wabo ushobora gusakara ukagera kuri benshi mu bateraniye mu Intare Arena.
Irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020 ryatangiriye mu Karere ka Rubavu ku wa 21 Ukuboza 2019, ahatoranyirijwe abakobwa batandatu bemerewe guhagararira Intara y’Uburengerazuba; ku wa 28 Ukuboza 2019 mu Karere ka Musanze hatoranyijwe abakobwa batandatu bahagarariye Amajyaruguru.
Umwaka wa 2020 watangiye irushanwa rikomereza mu Karere ka Huye aho ku wa 4 Mutarama havuye abakobwa barindwi bahagarariye Amajyepfo. Ijonjora ry’ibanze mu ntara ryasorejwe mu Karere ka Kayonza, ahavuye abakobwa 15 bahagarariye Uburasirazuba mu gihe ku wa 18 Mutarama 2020, abakobwa 20 batoranyirijwe guhagararira Umujyi wa Kigali.
Mu bakobwa 400 bose bageze ahabereye ijonjora ry’ibanze, 54 gusa ni bo bemeje abagize akanama nkemurampaka bemererwa gukomeza mu cyiciro cya nyuma cyasize havuyemo 20 bagiye mu mwiherero w’ibyumweru bibiri wabereye muri La Palisse Hotel i Nyamata.
Abakobwa 20 batangiye umwiherero ku wa 9 Gashyantare 2020, ariko Ingabire Jolie Ange ntiyagize amahirwe yo gukomeza kuko yasezeye mu irushanwa kubera uburwayi.
Irushanwa ry’ubwiza mu Rwanda ryatangiye mu 1993 icyo gihe Nyampinga yabaye Miss Uwera Dalila, ryambitswe Bahati Grace mu 2009, mu 2012 rihabwa Kayibanda Mutesi Aurore, mu 2014 ryambikwa Akiwacu Colombe, Kundwa Doriane arihabwa mu 2015, Mutesi Jolly atorwa mu 2016, Iradukunda Elsa afata irya 2017, irya 2018 ryahawe Iradukunda Liliane mu gihe iriheruka mu 2019 ryatwawe na Nimwiza Meghan.

Title: Alpha Blondy yasezeranye imbere y’Imana n’umunyamakuru ukora kuri radiyo ye
Body:
Seydou Koné waryubatse nka Alpha Blondy mu muziki wa Côte d’Ivoire yasezeranye mu rusengero n’umunya-Tuniziya Aelysa Darragi usanzwe ari umunyamakuru kuri radiyo ye ‘Bl Alpha Blondy FM’.
Seydou Koné waryubatse nka Alpha Blondy mu muziki wa Côte d’Ivoire yasezeranye mu rusengero n’umunya-Tuniziya Aelysa Darragi usanzwe ari umunyamakuru kuri radiyo ye ‘Bl Alpha Blondy FM’.
Muri Mata 2019 nibwo urukundo rwa Alpha Blondy na Aelysa Darragi rwashinze imizi ubwo bakoraga ubukwe bwa mbere gakondo. Muri Nyakanga 2019 aba babyaranye umwana w’umuhungu.
Ku wa Kane tariki 20 Gashyantare 2020 bakaba barasezeranye imbere y’Imana mu musigiti wa Riviera Golf.
Alpha Blondy yari asanzwe afite umuryango ndetse ibinyamakuru by’iwabo bihamya ko afite abana 11 harimo babiri bakorana mu buzima bwa buri munsi na batatu bihebeye umuziki nka we.
Alpha Blondy yabonye izuba ku wa 01 Mutarama 1953, avukira i Dombokro. Ni umuhanzi wiyeguriye injyana ya Reggae w’umuririmbyi n’umwanditsi w’indirimbo, yubatse izina mu gihe amaze mu muziki.
Indirimbo ze yazubakiye kuri Politiki n’ubuzima busanzwe, aziririmba mu ndimi zitandukanye zirimo; Dioula, Igifaransa n’Icyongereza rimwe na rimwe akanakoresha Icyarabu.
Alpha Brondy yakunzwe mu ndirimbo zitandukanye nka "Guerre Civile", "Jerusalem”, “Brigadier Sabari”, "Journalistes en danger" n’izindi. Mu bihe bitandukanye yagiye agera mu Rwanda mu bitaramo n’ibirori yabaga yatumiwemo nka Kigali Up Music Festival n’ibindi.
Amaze gushyira hanze album nka: Jah Glory! (1982), Cocody Rock!!! (1984), Apartheid Is Nazism (1985), Jérusalem (1986), Revolution (1987), The Prophets (1989), S.O.S Guerre Tribale (1991) n’izindi.

Title: Babou agiye gusubukura iby’umuziki nyuma yo kurangiza amashuri yisumbuye (Video)
Body:
Shema Arnaud benshi bamenye nka Babou nyuma y’uko arangije amasomo mu mashuri yisumbuye yahishuye ko agiye gusubukura iby’umuziki cyane ko yari yabaye abihagaritse kubera kwiga.
Shema Arnaud benshi bamenye nka Babou nyuma y’uko arangije amasomo mu mashuri yisumbuye yahishuye ko agiye gusubukura iby’umuziki cyane ko yari yabaye abihagaritse kubera kwiga.
Mu myaka yatambutse abagiye bakurikiranira hafi ibya muzika bamenye uwari umwana witwa Babou wamenyekanye cyane mu njyana ya Hip Hop.
Mu 2017 uyu musore yaje kuburirwa irengero mu muziki we gusa we ahamya ko byatewe n’uko yari ahugiye mu masomo.
Uyu musore warangije amasomo ye mu mwaka wa 2019 muri St Andre i Nyamirambo, aho yize imibare, ubugenge n’ubumenyi bw’Isi, akaba umwe mu bategereje amanota yavuye mu kizamini cya Leta yakoze.
Babou yatangiye umuziki afite imyaka umunani urukundo rwawo arukomoye kuri nyirarume Jerome Peterson wabarizwaga muri TFP Crew yari igizwe n’abahanzi batandukanye.
Avuga uko yinjiye mu muziki yagize ati” Nigeze kujya mu gitaramo cyarimo marume, ndeba uburyo baririmbye abantu bakishima dutashye mubwira ko mbishaka ansaba ko ngomba gutsinda neza mu mashuri abanza kugira ngo anyemerere kubijyamo. Mbaye uwa mbere icyo gihe nibwo yanyandikiye indirimbo aranayinkoreshereza.”
Babou avuga ko icyo gihe yafashijwe cyane na nyirarume ndetse n’itsinda ry’abo bakoranaga muri TFP.
Uyu musore yavuze ko ubwo yari agiye mu mwaka wa kane w’amashuri yisumbuye aribwo yahisemo kuba aretse iby’umuziki kugira ngo ahe umwanya amasomo ye.
Nyuma yo gusoza ibyo kwiga amashuri yisumbuye, Babou yabwiye IGIHE ko agiye gusubukura iby’umuziki ndetse mu gihe cya vuba azashyira hanze indirimbo ye nshya.
Kugeza ubu uyu musore aracyakorana bya hafi na nyirarume Peterson n’ubundi wamwinjije mu muziki.
Babou avuga ko umuziki w’u Rwanda kugeza ubu uhagaze neza, wateye imbere ndetse harimo amahirwe menshi yaba mu buryo abahanzi binjiza amafaranga ndetse n’ibikorwa remezo bituma abahanzi bakora neza mu buryo bworoshye.
Uyu muraperi wamenyekanye akiri umwana yashimiye buri wese wamubaye hafi akinjira mu muziki yaba abahanzi, abanyamakuru ndetse n’abakunzi b’umuziki bamuhaye icyizere cyabo, anabasaba kuzongera kumwakirana yombi mu gihe azaba agarutse.
Babou yamenyekanye cyane mu bwana bwe aho yafatwaga nk’umuraperi ukiri muto, aha akaba yari afite indirimbo zinyuranye zirimo iyitwa; Rimwe kabiri, Do it, Njye na Muzika yakoranye na Tuff Gang n’izindi nyinshi yaririmbye zirimo Arambona agaseka yaririmbye.

Title: Nyampinga wa Botswana, Sudani y’Epfo na Ghana bitabiriye ibirori bya Miss Rwanda 2020
Body:
Oweditse Phirinyane wo muri Botswana, Rebecca Nana Adwoa Kwabi wo muri Ghana uyu wazanye n’igisonga cye cya kabiri Princess Owusua Gyamfi na Mariah Nyayeina wo muri Sudan y’Amajyepfo baraye i Kigali bitabiriye irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020.
Oweditse Phirinyane wo muri Botswana, Rebecca Nana Adwoa Kwabi wo muri Ghana uyu wazanye n’igisonga cye cya kabiri Princess Owusua Gyamfi na Mariah Nyayeina wo muri Sudan y’Amajyepfo baraye i Kigali bitabiriye irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020.
Usibye Oweditse Phirinyane Nyampinga wa Botswana yageze i Kigali ku mugoroba wo ku wa Kane tariki 20 Gashyantare 2020, aba bakobwa bandi bageze i Kigali mu bihe bitandukanye byo kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 21 Gashyantare 2020 aho bitabiriye umuhango wo gutanga ikamba muri Miss Rwanda 2020.
Ku mugoroba w’uyu munsi nibwo Mariah Nyayeina, Nyampinga wa Sudani y’Epfo na we yageze mu Rwanda.
Uwanyuma wageze mu Rwanda ni Nyampinga wa Ghana, Rebecca Nana Adwoa Kwabi wabaye uwa gatanu witabiriye Miss Rwanda 2020.
Aba bose bahasanze Oliver Nakakande wo muri Uganda ndetse na Sylivia Sebastian wo muri Tanzania bahageze mbere y’abandi.
Miss Rwanda 2020 niyo ya mbere yitabiriwe n’abakobwa bo mu bindi bihugu.
Irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020 riri kugana ku musozo, abakobwa bahatanira ikamba bari mu mwiherero mbere y’iminsi mike ngo hamenyekane uzegukana ikamba. Ubu basigaye ari 19, nyuma y’uko Ingabire Jolie Ange yasezeye mu irushanwa kubera uburwayi.
Amatike yo kwinjira mu birori bizatangarizwamo Miss Rwanda 2020 yamaze gushyirwa ku isoko, abayashaka bashobora kuyagura bifashishije Mobile Money (*182*8*1*333111#), Ecobank cyangwa bakayasanga kuri Camellia muri KBC, Keza Saloon no kuri Smart Design.

Title: Abakobwa bari muri Miss Rwanda bahishuye agahinda batewe na Ingabire wavuyemo kubera uburwayi
Body:
Hagati mu mwiherero wa Miss Rwanda 2020 nibwo umwe mu bakobwa bahataniraga ikamba Ingabire Ange Jolie yasabye ubuyobozi ko yasezera mu irushanwa kuko yari yahuye n’uburwayi bwamusabaga kuba kwa muganga akitabwaho ari mu bitaro.
Hagati mu mwiherero wa Miss Rwanda 2020 nibwo umwe mu bakobwa bahataniraga ikamba Ingabire Ange Jolie yasabye ubuyobozi ko yasezera mu irushanwa kuko yari yahuye n’uburwayi bwamusabaga kuba kwa muganga akitabwaho ari mu bitaro.
Tariki 17 Gashyantare 2020 nibwo ubuyobozi bwa Miss Rwanda bwatangaje ko Ingabire yavuye mu irushanwa kubera uburwayi.
Nyuma y’iminsi avuye mu irushanwa abakobwa bahataniraga ikamba rya Miss Rwanda babwiye IGIHE ko bababajwe n’uyu mugenzi wabo utarabashije gukomeza guhatana kubera impamvu z’uburwayi.
Benshi muri aba bakobwa bahishuye ko ryari ijoro ribi cyane igihe basezeraga kuri Ingabire. Bahamya ko bababajwe nuko ibyamubayeho ari impamvu zatunguranye kandi nta yandi mahitamo bari bafite.
Ikindi aba bakobwa uko ari 19 bahurizaho ni uburyo Ingabire yababaniye neza mu mwiherero ku buryo kuvamo kwe byabaye agahinda gakomeye.
Kirezi Rutaremara Brune umwe mu bahatanira ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020 yagize ati ”Jolie Ange sinzi uko namuvuga; aritonda, mu bantu nabonaga bashoboraga gutwara n’ikamba na we yari arimo. Kumva ko avuye mu irushanwa atari iyindi mpamvu ari uburwayi, njye ku giti cyanjye byarambabaje.”
Uyu mukobwa avuga ko bose byabababaje cyane ku buryo iyo baganira muri rusange basanga iyaba hari ikindi cyashobokaga bari kugikora ariko byarenze ubushobozi bwabo.
Teta Ndenga Nicole wiganye na Ingabire mu mashuri yisumbuye we yavuze ko yababajwe bikomeye nuko uyu mukobwa w’inshuti ye yavuye mu irushanwa.
Akaliza Hope yavuze ko Ingabire ari umukobwa wakundaga kubatera imbaraga kenshi kabone n’iyo babaga bari gukora ibintu bigoye akababwira ko we yumva ntacyo bimutwaye.
Aba bakobwa bose bababajwe no kuva mu irushanwa kwa mugenzi wabo bamusabira gukira akamera neza ariko kandi akanihanganira ibyabaye bamwibutsa ko atari ryo herezo ry’ubuzima.
Ingabire Jolie Ange yasezeye mu irushanwa nyuma yuko yari yaryinjiyemo atsindiye guhagararira Intara y’Amajyepfo.
Itike yakuye mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo niyo yamwinjije muri Pre-Selection, aha naho yahanyuranye umucyo bituma yinjira muri 20 berekeje mu mwiherero.
Uyu mukobwa yasezeye muri Miss Rwanda nyuma y’icyumweru yari amaze mu mwiherero uri kubera La Palisse Hotel i Nyamata. Kuri ubu abakobwa basigaye bahatanira ikamba bakaba ari 19.
Umukobwa uzambikwa ikamba rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020 uzasimbura Nimwiza Meghan ufite irya 2019, azamenyekana mu birori biteganyijwe kubera muri Intare Conference Arena i Rusororo mu ijoro ryo ku wa 22 Gashyantare 2020.

Title: The Ben yasinye amasezerano y’imikoranire na Onomo Hotel yiyemeje kumushyigikira mu muziki we
Body:
Mugisha Benjamin wamamaye mu muziki nka The Ben yasinye amasezerano y’imikoranire na Onomo Hotel yiyemeje kumushyigikira mu muziki we.
Mugisha Benjamin wamamaye mu muziki nka The Ben yasinye amasezerano y’imikoranire na Onomo Hotel yiyemeje kumushyigikira mu muziki we.
Aya masezerano yasinyiwe kuri Onomo Hotel iherereye mu Mujyi wa Kigali, ku gicamunsi cyo kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 21 Gashyantare 2020.
Umuyobozi wa Onomo Hotel i Kigali, Emile Nizey, yabwiye itangazamakuru ko bishimiye guha ikaze The Ben mu mikoranire bagiye kugirana.
Yavuze ko amasezerano bagiranye ashingiye mu gushyigikira uyu muhanzi mu bikorwa bye bya muzika yaba mu Rwanda no ku rwego mpuzamahanga cyane cyane mu bihugu 18 iyi hoteli ifitemo amashami.
Yavuze ko bazashyigikira bishoboka umuziki wa The Ben mu rwego rwo guteza imbere uyu musore nk’umuhanzi w’Umunyarwanda bifuza gushyiramo imbaraga kugira ngo arusheho gutera imbere.
Ku ruhande rwa The Ben we avuga ko azaba yamamaza anamenyekanisha ibikorwa bya Onomo Hotel.
The Ben yavuze ko yanyuzwe n’imikoranire yemeranyijeho na Onomo Hotel ndetse anayishimira gahunda nziza bafitanye.
Amasezerano ahuriweho n’impande zombi nta gihe cyashyizweho agomba kurangiriraho, ahubwo naba atagitanga inyungu zihuriweho azashyirwaho iherezo.
The Ben abajijwe niba hari amafaranga yahawe n’umubare wayo, yagize ati ”Amafaranga nibyo arahari ariko twahisemo kuyagira ibanga.”
Ku kijyanye no gukorana na hoteli iri mu Rwanda nyamara ubusanzwe yibera muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, The Ben yavuze ko ntaho bizahurira kuko uburyo azakorana nayo ari ibintu ashobora gukorera ahantu hose azaba ari.
Nizey yifashishije urugero mu gushimangira iyo mikorere yavuze ko ” Wenda hari igihe yajya muri Tanzania, Afurika y’Epfo n’ahandi dufite amashami. Iki gihe aba yizeye ko nta kibazo agira cy’aho kuba n’uburyo bwo kubaho kimwe n’ikipe ye. Tuzamufasha muri buri kimwe dushoboye.”
Mbere yo gusinyana amasezerano na Onomo Hotel, The Ben yijeje abanyamakuru ko abona ubu bufatanye buzamufasha mu iterambere rya muzika ye cyane ko bizanamufasha ku rwego mpuzamahanga bikagabanya ingorane yahuraga nazo.
The Ben yavukiye i Kampala muri Uganda ku wa 9 Mutarama 1988. Ni mwene Jean Mbonimpa na Esther Mbabazi. Ni uwa kabiri mu muryango w’abana batandatu barimo nka Danny Scott (na we wabaye umuhanzi, ananyura mu itsinda rya B Gun), Green P (umuraperi wamamariye muri Tuff Gangz) n’abandi.
Uyu muhanzi Nyarwanda uririmba injyana ya RnB/Pop. Yatangiye impano y’ubuhanzi abihereye mu muryango aho yakuze akundishwa n’ababyeyi be gusenga cyane.
Byatumye ajya muri korali aho yari ari kumwe n’abandi bahanzi bamenyekanye nka Meddy, Lick Lick na Nicolas.
Indirimbo yazamuye izina rye ni ‘‘Amaso ku Maso’’ yasohoye mu 2008. Izindi ndirimbo zizwi ni ‘‘Si beza’’ na ‘‘Mbwira’’ yahuriyemo na Tom Close; ‘‘Uzaba Uza’’ yaririmbanye na Roger, ‘‘Wirira’’, ‘‘Imfubyi’’ yahuriyemo na Bull Dogg, ‘‘Wigenda’’, ‘‘Uri he’’, ‘‘Sinzibagirwa’’, ‘‘Amahirwe ya nyuma’’ na ‘‘Zubeda’’.
Nyuma yaho yaje no gusohora indirimbo nka ‘‘Ese nibyo’’ mbere yo kwerekeza muri Amerika aho yakomereje ubuhanzi bwe.

Title: Miss Rwanda 2020: Ibyo abakobwa bazakumbura mu mwiherero n’umushinga wa buri wese (Video)
Body:
Abakobwa 19 bari kurangiza umwiherero wa Miss Rwanda 2020 mu gihe bitegura umunsi wa nyuma w’irushanwa uzatanga Nyampinga w’u Rwanda wa 2020.
Abakobwa 19 bari kurangiza umwiherero wa Miss Rwanda 2020 mu gihe bitegura umunsi wa nyuma w’irushanwa uzatanga Nyampinga w’u Rwanda wa 2020.
Aba bakobwa babaye 19 nyuma y’uko mugenzi wabo Ingabire Jolie Ange atabashije gukomeza cyane ko yasezeye kubera uburwayi bwamutunguye bugatuma atabasha gukomeza irushanwa.
Aba bakobwa uko ari 19 bose twabasuye mu mwiherero tuganira ku bintu binyuranye birimo uko bari babayeho mu mwiherero, ibyo bazawukumburamo n’incamake ku mishinga yabo.
Mu biganiro n’aba bakobwa bose bahuriza ku kuba bazakumbura umwiherero wa Miss Rwanda kuko bari babanye neza, babayeho nk’umuryango.
Akaliza Hope yagize ati “Nzakumbura abakobwa tubana muri rusange, uko twasangiraga, uko twagendanaga mbega ni byinshi.”
Musana Teta Hense nawe uri mu bahatana muri Miss Rwanda 2020 yavuze ko azakumbura bagenzi be, ibiganiro bahabwaga n’ibindi.
Ati “Nzakumbura aba bakobwa twabanye, buri wese afite umwihariko we. Nzakumbura ibiganiro byari byiza. Kubona amahirwe yo kubona abayobozi batuganiriza nzabikumbura.”
Nishimwe Naomie na we yagize ati “Ikintu nzakumbura ni ugusangira nijoro n’abandi bakobwa ubundi tukaza kumva gahunda z’undi munsi turi kuririmba nzabikumbura cyane.”
Imishinga yabo
Ikirezi Rutaremara Brune yavuze ko afite umushinga wo gufasha abanyarwanda bafite ubumuga bwo mu mutwe. Ingabire Rehma we afite umushinga wo guteza imbere imibereho ya mwarimu.
Teta Ndenga Nicole yavuze ko afite umushinga wo gukangurira abanyarwanda n’urubyiruko guhinga ibiti by’imbuto. Akaliza Hope we yavuze ko umushinga we ushingiye ku gukangurira abana b’abakobwa kwitabira kwiga ubukerarugendo.
Mutesi Denise afite umushinga wo kugabanya umubare w’abantu badafite akazi mu gihugu cy’u Rwanda. Umutesi Denise umushinga we ni uguteza imbere uburenganzira bw’abaguzi.
Mutegwantebe Chanice afite umushinga wo guhuriza hamwe abantu batishoboye basabiriza ku mihanda mu rwego rwo kubafasha kwiteza imbere.
Nishimwe Naomie afite umushinga wo kurwanya ubwigunge mu rubyiruko. Musana Teta Hense we umushinga we ni ukurwanya kanseri mu Rwanda.
Umuratwa Anitha umushinga we ni ugufasha abana kubyaza impano zabo umusaruro cyane cyane siporo. Marebe Benitha umushinga afite umushinga wo kubaka ubushobozi bw’urubyiruko rufite ubumuga.
Irasubiza Alliance umushinga we ni ukurwanya inda z’imburagihe mu bana bakiri bato bari munsi y’imyaka 18.
Ingabire Diane afite umushinga wo kurwanya ibiyobyabwenge cyane cyane mu rubyiruko. Uwase Aisha we afite umushinga wo gukangurira abahuye n’ihohoterwa kutariceceka.
Mukangwije Rosine afite umushinga wo gushishikariza urubyiruko kwiteza imbere binyuze mu kwikorera.
Nyinawumuntu Delice we afite umushinga wo gushishikariza abana b’abakobwa kwiga siyansi n’ikoranabuhanga. Ingabire Gaudance afite umushinga wo gushishikariza urubyiriko kwitabira ubukerarugendo bw’imbere mu gihugu mu gihe Umwiza Phionah afite umusinga wo kurwanya ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina rikorerwa abana bari munsi y’imyaka 18.
Kamikazi Rurangirwa Nadege we afite umushinga wo kwita kubana bafite indwara izwi nka “Down Syndrome” no guhugura imiryango yabo uburyo babitaho. Ni indwara ifata umwana ukiri mu nda ya nyina. Ishobora gutuma umwana avuka hari uduce tw’umubiri tumwe na tumwe abuze cyangwa se mu mutwe he hadakora nk’ibisanzwe.
Kugeza ubu irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020 riri kugana ku musozo abakobwa bahatanira ikamba bari mu mwiherero mbere y’amasaha make ngo hamenyekane uzegukana ikamba.
Aba bakobwa bari mu mwiherero bamaze kuvamo umwe cyane ko ubu basigaye ari 19 nyuma y’uko Ingabire Jolie Ange asezeye mu irushanwa kubera uburwayi.
Umukobwa uzambikwa ikamba rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020 uzasimbura Nimwiza Meghan ufite irya 2019, azamenyekana mu birori biteganyijwe kubera muri Intare Conference Arena i Rusororo mu ijoro ryo ku wa 22 Gashyantare 2020.
Kugeza ubu amatike yo kwinjira mu irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020 yashyizwe ku isoko; abayashaka bashobora kuyagura bifashishije Mobile Money (*182*8*1*333111#), Ecobank cyangwa bakayasanga kuri Camellia KBC, Keza Saloon no kuri Smart Design.

Title: Abakobwa batabashije gukomeza muri Miss Rwanda 2020 bakomereje ibikorwa by’urukundo mu Karere ka Gisagara
Body:
Nyuma yo kwiyemeza kwihuriza hamwe bagakora ibikorwa by’urukundo, abakobwa 34 batabashije kurenga ijonjora rya nyuma (Pre-Selection) ry’irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020 bakomeje gushyira mu bikorwa imishinga bari barateguye.
Nyuma yo kwiyemeza kwihuriza hamwe bagakora ibikorwa by’urukundo, abakobwa 34 batabashije kurenga ijonjora rya nyuma (Pre-Selection) ry’irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020 bakomeje gushyira mu bikorwa imishinga bari barateguye.
Abo bakobwa bibumbiye mu itsinda “We for the Nation” kuri uyu wa Kane tariki ya 20 Gashyantare 2020 bakomereje ibyo bikorwa mu Karere ka Gisagara aho baganirije urubyiruko rw’abanyeshuri ku gukumira gusambanya abana ndetse no kurwanya inda z’imburagihe ziterwa abangavu.
Ni nyuma y’uko ku wa 13 Gashyantare 2020 basuye ikigo kirererwamo abana bafite ubumuga cya HVP Gatagara i Gikondo ho mu mujyi wa Kigali; aho baganiriye n’ubuyobozi bwabasobanuriye ibikorwa bihakorerwa buri munsi ndetse banagira umwanya wo kwifatanya n’abana baharererwa yaba mu gusangira ndetse no kwidagadurana.
Gaju Evelyne uhagarariye iryo tsinda yavuze ko bahisemo kuganiriza urubyiruko ku ngingo yo gusambanya abana no gukumira inda ziterwa abangavu kuko ari ikibazo gihangayikishije muri iki gihe.
Ati “Buri mukobwa muri twe yari afite umushinga we; uyu wo gukumira inda zitateganyijwe ni imwe muri iyo mishinga. Gusa ikibazo cy’abana basabanywa ndetse n’icy’abangavu baterwa inda kirahangayikishije ni yo mpamvu twiyemeje gutanga umusanzu mu kuzikumira tuganiriza urubyiruko.”
Kuri ubu itsinda “We for the Nation” rigizwe n’abakobwa 34 ariko abaje kuganiriza urubyiruko mu Karere ka Gisagara ni 10 kuko bagenzi babo bari mu bindi bikorwa birimo kwiga n’ibindi.
Mu Karere ka Gisagara baganirije urubyiruko rw’abanyeshuri biga kuri GS Saint Philippe Neri hamwe n’abiga kuri Saint Eugenie Smet aho bari bahuriye ku kibuga cy’umupira w’amaguru kuko ayo mashuri yombi yari yakinnye.
Igihozo Dianne watanze ikiganiro yagarutse ku ngaruka zo gusambanya abana no gutwara inda imburagihe, asaba urubyiruko kwirinda ibishuko bishobora kubashora mu busambanyi.
Yagize ati “Cyane cyane nkamwe b’abanyeshuri na twe twese akenshi hari igihe badushukishaga amandazi, bombo, amafaranga n’ibindi. Icya mbere ni uko abana b’abakobwa tugomba kumenya ko dufite agaciro tukirinda abadushuka.”
Yabibukije ko umukobwa usambanyijwe agaterwa inda bimugiraho ingaruka mbi zitandukanye bikamwicira ejo hazaza.
Ati “Muri mwe harimo abazaba Abadepite; Abaminisitiri cyangwa mukazayobora mu bundi buryo. Mureke twirinde ibishuko bitwicira ejo hazaza.”
Nyuma y’ibiganiro byatanzwe urubyiruko rwahawe umwanya wo kubaza ibibazo bitandukanye byibanze ku buzima bw’imyororokere.
Umukozi ushinzwe uburinganire n’iterambere ry’umuryango mu Karere ka Gisagara, Sewabo Vincent, ni we wabakiriye ashima ibikorwa byabo abizeza ubufatanye.
Ati “Ni byiza kuko biraza gutuma hari icyo twunguka mu kugabanya imibare y’abana bakomeje gusabanywa mu karere.”
Sewabo yavuze ko mu mezi 11 ashize mu Karere ka Gisagara hagaragaye abangavu bagera kuri 214 bari munsi y’imyaka 17 batewe inda imburagihe.
Urubyiruko rwagiriwe inama yo kudahishira abasore n’abagabo basambanya abangavu kuko babicira ubuzima bityo bakwiye guhanwa by’intangarugero kugira ngo abandi babonereho hatazagira utekereza kongera guhirahira asambanya umwangavu.
Gaju Evelyne uhagarariye “We for the Nation” yavuze ko bishimiye uko igikorwa bateguye mu Karere ka Gisagara cyagenze bityo byabongereye imbaraga zo gukomeza ibyo biyemeje.
Yavuze ko bashinze uwo muryango bagamije gukora ibikorwa by’urukundo nk’uko bari babyiyemeje ubwo bitabiraga irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020 bityo biteguye no kwakira umufatanyabikorwa wese waza kubashyigikira.

Title: Niyo Bosco yasohoye indirimbo nshya yise “Ibanga”
Body:
Niyo Bosco umaze kubaka izina mu mitima ya benshi mu bakunzi b’umuziki w’u Rwanda kuri ubu yasohoye indirimbo ye nshya yise “Ibanga” ikurikira “Ubigenza ute?” uyu musore yaherukaga gushyira hanze.
Niyo Bosco umaze kubaka izina mu mitima ya benshi mu bakunzi b’umuziki w’u Rwanda kuri ubu yasohoye indirimbo ye nshya yise “Ibanga” ikurikira “Ubigenza ute?” uyu musore yaherukaga gushyira hanze.
Indirimbo “Ibanga” ya Niyo Bosco ikubiyemo ubutumwa bukangurira abantu kugira ibanga, agaragazamo ingaruka zikunze kuba ku bantu batarigira.
Mu nyikirizo y’iyi ndirimbo uyu muhanzi agira ati ”Ibanga ni igihamya cyemeza ko uri umwizerwa, kugira ibanga nibyo bishimangira ubupfura bwawe. Uko waba uri kose utagira ibanga amagambo uvugwa niyo menshi kurusha ayo avuga! Jya uvuga uziga […].”
Uyu muhanzi yakanguriye abantu kuvuga baziga, bakavuga ibyo babajijwe cyane ko n’umunyarwanda yaciye umugani ko akarimi kabi gasemera agasaya.
Niyokwizerwa Bosco wamenyekanye nka Niyo Bosco ni umusore w’imyaka 20 y’amavuko ukora umuziki ariko afite ubumuga bwo kutabona.
Mu kiganiro aherutse kugirana na IGIHE, Niyo Bosco yasabye abantu kutumva ko yaba akunzwe kubera impuhwe agirirwa ku bw’ikibazo afite ahubwo bakita ku mpano ye mu muziki.
Uyu wahereye cyera aririmba ariko atarabona ubushobozi, yaje kurabukwa n’umunyamakuru Irene Mulindahabi wamufashije kumenyekanisha impano ye mu 2019.
Nyuma yuko Isi yose ibonye impano iri muri uyu musore, abantu banyuranye biyemeje kumufasha, kuri ubu Niyo Bosco afite ikipe imufasha mu bijyanye na muzika ndetse no mu buzima bwa buri munsi.
Iyi ndirimbo ye nshya mu buryo w’amajwi yakorewe muri Uno Record ikorwa na Producer witwa Santana mu gihe amashusho yayo yafashwe akanatunganywa na Bagenzi Bernard uri mu bagezweho muri iyi minsi.

Title: Ubwoba, kimwe mu bitiza umurindi coronavirus
Body:
Muri iyi minsi, isi yose ihangayikishijwe n’icyorezo cya coronavirus kigenda gikwirakwira hose ari nako gihitana benshi. Mu by’ukuri abantu benshi ntibabasha kumva umuvuduko iki cyorezo kigenderaho ndetse n’ingaruka kigira kubatuye isi bose.
Muri iyi minsi, isi yose ihangayikishijwe n’icyorezo cya coronavirus kigenda gikwirakwira hose ari nako gihitana benshi. Mu by’ukuri abantu benshi ntibabasha kumva umuvuduko iki cyorezo kigenderaho ndetse n’ingaruka kigira kubatuye isi bose.
Inkuru zijyanye n’icyo cyorezo ziracicikana hose hifashishijwe uburyo butandukanye, harimo insakazamajwi, insakazamashusho, ibinyamakuru byanditse ndetse n’imbuga nkoranyambaga zitandukanye aho amafoto y’amasanduku arimo abapfuye, imibare yiyongera y’abandura n’abahitanwa n’icyo cyorezo, inkuru zisanisha icyorezo n’ubuhanuzi butandukanye, n’ibindi. Hejuru y’ibyo abantu basoma, hari n’ibyo babasha kwibonera n’amaso yabo.
Umuntu, ni ikiremwa kitifuza kuba cyonyine. Kimwe mu bishimisha umuntu ni ukuba ari hafi y’abandi, atekanye, yumva yizeye abo bari kumwe, yitaweho kandi yita ku bandi ndetse afite agaciro mu bandi. Imwe mu ngaruka zikomeye abantu bahura nazo uyu munsi, ni ukubura ituze ry’umutima bitewe n’ubwoba bw’ibyo batazi bishobora kuba ku buzima bwabo. Ibi bituma abantu bumva bahangayitse cyane.
Ni kenshi iyo abantu baganira ku bibahangayikishije birimo n’ibyorezo bitandukanye nka coronavirus, bagira bati “Ubwoba bwanyishe”. Uyu munsi, turabara umubare w’abari kwicwa n’icyorezo cyugarije isi, ariko ntabwo tubasha kubara umubare w’abari kwicwa n’ubwoba. Ubwoba ni umwicanyi mubi cyane ndetse wica benshi kurusha ibindi byose.
Abahanga bagaragaza ko ubwoba buca intege umubiri, bugatuma utabasha guhangana neza n’ingaruka z’ibiwugarije. Ibyo bivuze ko ubudahangarwa bw’umubiri bugabanuka, bityo umubiri ukaba watsindwa kuburyo bworoshye. Ibyo bivuze kandi ko ubwoba ari kimwe mu bishobora gukwirakwiza icyorezo cya coronavirus nk’uko kudakaraba, kuramukanya, kudasiga intera ihagije hagati y’abantu, gukorora no kwitsamurira mu bandi, bigikwirakwiza.
 Icyorezo kikimara kugaragara mu Rwanda, Nyakubahwa Perezida wa Repuburika y’u Rwanda Paul Kagame yasabye abantu kutagira ubwoba, kuko aribyo bizatuma dutsinda. Ibyo kandi byagaragaye mu mvugo zitandukanye z’abayobozi.
Kwirinda kugira no gukwirakwiza ubwoba ni imwe mu ngamba zadufasha guhangana n’icyorezo cya coronavirus ndetse n’ingaruka zacyo. Ibyo kandi byadufasha gusigasira ubuzima bwacu dore ko ubwoba kimwe n’andi marangamutima akabije byangiza imitekerereze y’abantu n’imikorere y’umubiri.
Abahanga bagaragaza ko iyo amarangamutima ari hejuru, gutekereza biragabanuka cyane, bityo kwitekerezaho, gutekereza ku bacu n’igihugu cyacu bikahazaharira. Ubwoba rero butuma tutabasha no gutekereza ku cyo twakora ngo twivane mu bibazo, aho bamwe bibarenga bikagera aho babona ko ubuzima nta gaciro bufite. Akenshi ibyo bishobora kuganisha kukwiyambura ubuzima, nk’ikimenyetso cyo gutsindwa urugamba rw’ubuzima.
Ubwoba ntibugira ingaruka ku mitekerereze gusa, ahubwo ingaruka zigera no ku mubiri wose. Bigira ingaruka ku mikorere y’umutima w’umuntu ushobora gutera cyane ndetse ukaba wananirwa, bishobora kugira ingaruka zitandukanye by’umwihariko ku basanzwe bafite ikibazo cy’umutima n’izindi ndwara zifite aho zihurira nawo. Umuntu ashobora kandi guhumeka nabi, ibi byatiza umurindi kuremba k’uwanduye-, igifu gishobora gukora nabi, imitsi y’umubiri icika intege, umuntu ashobora kubura ubushake bwo kurya no gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina, n’ibindi.
Ingaruka rero ni nyinshi cyane, ariko kugira ubwoba ni ibintu bisanzwe, ni na kimwe mu biranga ko umuntu ari muzima. Ikibazo si ukugira ubwoba, ikibazo ni icyo tubukoraho, uko twitwara mu gihe tugize ubwoba, cyangwa uko busenya imbaraga n’igisobanuro cy’ubuzima kuri twe. Muri rusange, iyo hatagize igikorwa, ingaruka zikomoka ku bwoba ziba nyinshi cyane, ubwazo zikaba zaganisha ku rupfu.
Mu nkuru ikurikiyeho, tuzaganira kucyo twakora kugira ngo dutsinde ingaruka z’ubwoba buturuka kuri coronavirus, bityo dukomeze dusigasire ubuzima bwacu, ubw’imiryango ndetse n’igihugu cyacu.
Diogene Karangwa

Title: Hari ahakwiye za Rond-point mu mihanda y’i Kigali
Body:
Isangano ry’imihanda [Rond-point] ni bumwe mu buryo bwiza ndetse buhiga ubundi bwose mu koroshya no kunoza inyuranamo ry’ibinyabiziga mu mahuriro y’imihanda (Muribuka umubyigano w’imodoka wabaga Remera-Kisimenti n’aho bita mu Kanogo, mbere y’uko hashyirwa za Rond-point).
Isangano ry’imihanda [Rond-point] ni bumwe mu buryo bwiza ndetse buhiga ubundi bwose mu koroshya no kunoza inyuranamo ry’ibinyabiziga mu mahuriro y’imihanda (Muribuka umubyigano w’imodoka wabaga Remera-Kisimenti n’aho bita mu Kanogo, mbere y’uko hashyirwa za Rond-point).
Mu gihe abatwara ibinyabiziga bagorwa cyane no gucunga ibiturutse mu mpande zose mu mahuriro y’imihanda (iburyo, ibumoso, imbere) cyangwa batanguranwa gutambuka mbere banga ko Feu-rouge zibafata (bikaba byaba intandaro y’impanuka), Rond-Point zo zikoze ku buryo imihanda iyinjiramo iba nk’ihese bigatuma urujya n’uruza (circulation) rwerekeza mu cyerekezo kimwe, bityo, utwaye ikinyabiziga agacungana gusa n’ibindi binyabiziga bituruka mu ruhande rumwe rw’ibumoso (kubatwarira ibumoso nko mu Rwanda) cyangwa urw’iburyo (kubatwarira iburyo nko mu Bwongereza).
Uko korohereza abashoferi bituma nta mpanuka nyinshi zibera muri Rond-point kandi bikihutisha urujya n’uruza kuko ibinyabiziga bidasabwa guhagarara.
Nubwo muri Kigali tumenyereye Rond-point z’uruziga, si ngombwa ko rond-point igomba kuba ari uruziga rugororotse, icyangombwa ni uko ibinyabiziga bishobora kuhakatira mu buryo bworoshye.
Nk’uko tubikesha urubuga rw’iIkigo gishinzwe Ubwikorezi i Washington, mu kugena ahajya Rond-point, iby’ingenzi byitabwaho ni umwanya w’aho yakubakwa n’umubyigano w’ibinyabiziga bihaca.
Ibyo Rond-point zirusha ubundi buryo
Mu bushakashatsi bwakorewe muri Amerika n’ikigo gishinzwe imihanda minini gifatanyije n’ikindi gishinzwe ubwishingizi n’umutekano wo ku mihanda minini (Federal Highway Administration- FHWA & Insurance Institute for Highway Safety -HIS), bwagaragaje ko rond-point zifite ubushobozi bwo kugabanya impanuka ho 90% kurusha ubundi buryo bwose burimo na Feu-Rouge.
Rond-point zigabanya:
 90% by’impanuka zihitana ubuzima bw’abantu
 75% byo gukomerekera mu muhanda
 40% by’abanyamaguru bagongwa n’imodoka
 37% by’impanuka zose
Impamvu zituma rond-point zitanga umusaruro kuri urwo rwego ni uko zituma ibinyabiziga bigenda buhoro bigatuma nta mpanuka zikunze kuhabera n’ibaye ikaba yoroheje.
Ituma kandi ibinyabiziga bidasiganwa n’amatara atukura (bikunze kuba muri Feu-Rouge bikanaba intandaro y’impanuka).
Ikindi kandi Rond-Point zikoze ku buryo ibinyabiziga bihana umwanya bitagombye ko hari bimwe bihagarara.
Ibinyabiziga bigenda umujyo umwe. Imihanda yinjira muri rond-point, ikoze ku buryo abakoresha umuhanda baba basa n’aberekeza mu nzira imwe bigatuma utwaye ikinyabiziga yoroherwa kuko aba acungana n’ibinyabiziga biri mu ruhande rumwe gusa.
Hari kandi ukwihutisha ibinyabiziga no kugabanya umubyigano (Traffic Jam). Uretse kubungabunga umutekano wo mu muhanda, Rond-point zifite ubushobozi bwo guhangana n’umubyigano w’imodoka.
Bitandukanye na Feu-Rouge, muri rond-point ntabwo ikinyabiziga gisabwa gutegereza ko itara ry’icyatsi kibisi ryaka, ahubwo ibinyabiziga bigabanya umuvuduko bigakomeza bikagenda.
Inyigo zakozwe muri Amerika zipima uko ibinyabiziga bigenda ahari Feu-Rouge n’ahari Rond-point, zerekanye ko Rond-point zihutisha ibinyabiziga ho 89% kurusha Feu-Rouge ndetse zikagabanya uguhagarara kw’ibinyabiziga ho 56%. (Washington State Department of Transportation, 2020).
Rond-point zirahendutse ugereranyije na Feu-Rouge
Ugereranyije ibigenda kuri Feu-Rouge nk’umuriro w’amashanyarazi, kuzitaho (maintenance), kuzisana (bazigonze) no kudakora icyo zigomba gukora mu gihe umuriro w’amashanyarazi wagiye, Rond-point zo nta kijya kizibuza gukora akazi kazo.
Mu mihanda iri kwagurwa n’indi mishya muri Kigali, hari amahuriro ubona yagakwiye kujyamo Rond-Point, ugereranyije umwanya uhari (space) n’ubucucike bw’ibinyabiziga bihaca.
Igereranya ry’ahashobora kujya Rond-point n’izindi Rond-point (hakoreshejwe Google maps)
Iki ni igitekerezo cy’umwanditsi, mbiseguyeho mu gihe hagira uwo gikomeretsa. Mu gupima hifashishijwe google maps
Nshimiyimana Jean Pierre
